On folio 1a: A reader's note: "Qad ṭālaʻa fīhi al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Raʼūf, al-shahīr bi-Abī Ghazālah, ʻufiya ʻanhu. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: "Wa-baʻd, fa-qad wulida al-najl al-saʻīd Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh min sulālat Ṣāliḥ al-Ṣāliḥ al-mukanná Abī Ghazālah, laylat al-ʻīd, fī tisʻ wa-ʻishrīn khalat min Jumād al-Awwal, sanat 1177 baʻda al-Hijrah [5 December, 1763], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-awf [wa-awfá] al-salām."
At the head of folio 1b, in brown ink: "Hādhā Kitāb Abū al-Layth Muqaddimasī."
On the back of the front cover and on folio 72b: An invocation to protect the book from paper worms: "Yā Kubaykij Iḥfaẓ hādhā al-kitāb min al-ʻith."

Colophon: "Katabahu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-naḥīf, al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Allāh al-laṭīf, ʻUthmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi. Tamm." "al-Sanah 1161."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the weak and feeble servant, who is in need of the mercy of the Kind God, ʻUthmān ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, may God forgive him, his parents, and be favorable to them and to him. It is completed." "The year 1161 [of the Hijrah = 1748]."

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻAqīdah al-wusṭá : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-salām [wa-al-salām] ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn wa-imām al-mursalīn, wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh ajmaʻīn, wa-man tabiʻahum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi jumāl [jumal] mukhtaṣarah, yakhruju al-mukallaf bi-fahmihā, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, min al-taqlīd al-mukhtalaf fī īmān ṣāḥibihi, ilá al-naẓar al-ṣaḥīḥ, al-mujmaʻ ʻalá īmān ṣāḥibihi, wa-dhālika an taʻlama awwalan anna al-ḥukm al-ʻaqlī munḥaṣir fī thalāthat aqsām: al-Wujūb, wa-al-jawāz wa-al-istiḥālah, wa-ʻalá hādhihi al-thalāthah mabāḥth ʻilm al-kalām kulluhā ..."
Secundo folio: mawjūdan fī al-azal lam yakhlu.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10-10.5 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In red buckram binding (in 1 quire).

In fair and clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; numerous commentaries on the margins, keywords and headings in red or purple; catchwords. The folios are numbered in Indian numerals: Q1-Q12. Folio 12 is blank; text folios 1b-11b.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-ʻAqīdah al-wusṭah [al-wusṭá], taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-faqīh al-fāḍil al-nabīh, Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sanūsī al-Ḥusaynī, aḥsana Allāh ilayhi, wa-rafaʻa maqāmahu ladayhi, wa-nafaʻa bi-ʻulūmihi bi-hi al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

On folio 1a: A statement indicating that the manuscript was presented to the prominent scholar and Shaykh al-Islām Abū al-Hudá al-Ṣayyādī (Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan Wādī, 1849 or 1850-1910 or 1911): "Hadīyah li-Sayyid <minhu> yuʻtamadu ʻalayhi fī ḥusn al-irshād wa-al-iʻtiqād Ṣayyādī Zādah, al-Sayyid Muḥammad Abū al-Hudá Afandī, lā zāla lil-ʻulūm. Wa-ḥarasahu Mawlāhu wa-najlahu. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: Three quotations in prose and verse, praising "ʻIlm al-kalām" (literally 'science of talking', i.e., Islamic scholastic theology).
At the upper left corner of folio 1a, a partially washed out name of: "ʻUmar al-Quṭayfānī."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... Wa-al-qaṣd min hādhihi al-ʻujālah innamā huwa dhikr mā yukhriju al-mukallaf ʻan al-taqlīd fī al-ʻaqāʼid, wa-fahm hādhihi al-jumlah wāfin bi-dhālik, in yassara Allāh subḥānuhu, atamm wafāʼ, wa-Huwa jalla wa-ʻalā al-mustaʻān wa-al-masʼūl an yukhrijanā bi-faḍlihi, wa-yakhruju bi-nā min al-ẓulumāt ilá al-nūr wa-an yukrimanā wa-yukrima ʻalá aydīnā, bi-mā yujibu lanā wa-li-aḥibbatinā min al-naʻīm fī aʻlā al-Firdaws bi-sharīf maʻrifatihi wa-ladhīdh ruʼyatihi aʻẓam surūr. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad ʻadada mā dhakarahu al-dhākirūn wa-ghafila ʻan dhikrihi al-ghāfilūn. Wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. M M M."

record.title: Treatises on Sufism and Islamic ethics : manuscript.
record.note: Title of al-Zahr al-fāʼiḥ fī man tanazzaha ʻan al-dhunūb wa-al-qabāʼiḥ from folio 1a.
Title of al-Zill al-mamdūd fī maʻná waḥdat al-wujūd from incipit (folio 30b).
Title of Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah li-ahl al-Iradah from folio 48a.
Title of Hilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu ʻanhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl from incipit (folio 51b).
Title of al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yalzamu ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ from folio 55a.
Title of Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam from folio 77a.
Title of Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm from folio 111a.
Title of Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ from folio 191a.
Title of Ithbāt al-wājib from from folio 261a.
Title of Maqūlāt Ibn al-ʻArabī supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Zahr al-fāʼiḥ fī man tanazzaha ʻan al-dhunūb wa-al-qabāʼiḥ (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Bismillāh wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh, bi-hi aqtadī wa-bi-nabīyihi ahtadī, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdah lā sharīka lahu, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá yawm al-dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna ḥuqūq Allāh taʻālá aʻẓam min an yaqūma bi-hā al-ʻabd, wa-inna niʻamahu akthar min an tuḥṣá, wa-lākin ʻibād Allāh aḍḥaw nāʼiyīn, fa-inna Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá la-hu ʻalaynā ḥuqūqan, wa-sharaṭ ʻalaynā shurūṭan, fa-wajaba ʻalaynā an nuʼaddīhā. Fa-lā takun yā akhī ghāfilan ʻanhā, fa-anta muḥāsabun bi-hā yawm al-qiyāmah ..."
Secundo folio of al-Zahr al-fāʼiḥ fī man tanazzaha ʻan al-dhunūb wa-al-qabāʼiḥ: qad lāmat wa-infataḥat.

Incipit of al-Ẓill al-mamdūd fī maʻná waḥdat al-wujūd (folio 30b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-hidāyah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh fī kull bidāyah wa-nihāyah, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ ālihi wa-aṣḥābih ulī al-riʻāyah wa-al-ʻināyah, wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn lahum wa-tābiʻ al-tābiʻīn bi-khayr wa-iḥsān fī kull makān wa-kull zamān. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá mawlāhu al-ghanī al-khabīr ʻAbd al-Ghanī, atḥafahu Allāh bi-al-maqām al-sanī wa-al-mashrab al-hanī: Ṭalaba minī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah an ataʻarraḍa li-wajh salīmī, wa-ajdhiba ridāʼ al-malik wa-bazzah, wa-ashraḥa Risālat Waḥdat al-wujūd, ʻalá annahā min taṣnīf al-ʻārif al-kāmil fī maqām al-shuhūd al-Mullā ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Jāmī dhī al-qadr al-sāmī wa-al-fayḍ al-nāmī ... qāṣidan tasmiyat kitābī hādhā bi-al-Ẓill al-mamdūd fī maʻná waḥdat al-wujūd ..."
Secundo folio of al-Ẓill al-mamdūd fī maʻná waḥdat al-wujūd: al-ilāh min ḥaythu hiya hiya.

Incipit of Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah li-ahl al-Iradah (folio 48b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Akbar wa-al-nūr al-azhar Muḥyī al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Muḥammad ibn al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi wa-bi-ʻulūmihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālih: al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Jawāb suʼāl saʼalahu baʻḍ al-ikhwān, ayyadahu Allāh taʻālá bi-rūḥ minhu ʻan maʻānī faḍāʼil 'Lā ilāha illā Allāh' bi-al-maʻná al-maʻqūl, lā bi-al-khabar al-manqūl ..."
Secundo folio of Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah li-ahl al-Iradah: kānat al-manfīyat khamsah.

Incipit of Ḥilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu fīhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl (folio 51b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā alhama an ʻallamanā mā lam nakun naʻlam, wa-kāna faḍl Allāh ʻalaynā ʻaẓīman, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá al-Sayyid al-akram al-muʻṭá jawāmiʻ al-kalim bi-al-mawqif al-aʻẓam, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī istakhartu Allāh taʻālá, laylat al-Ithnayn, al-thānī ʻashar min Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat tisʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-khamsimiʼah bi-manzil Āl Umayyah, bi-al-Ṭ́āʼif, fī ziyāratinā ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-ʻAbbās ʻamm Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-kāna sabab istikhāratī suʼāl ṣāḥibī Abī Muḥammad Badr ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Ḥabashī, ʻatīq Abī al-Ghanāʼim ibn Abī al-Futūḥ al-Ḥarrānī wa-Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Khālid al-Ṣadafī al-Tilimsānī, waffaqahumā Allāh, an uqayyida lahumā fī hādhihi al-ayyām, ayyām al-ziyārah, mā yantafiʻūna bi-hi fī ṭarīq al-ākhirah, fa-istakhartu Allāh fī dhālik, wa-qayyadtu lahumā hādhihi al-kurrāsah allatī wa-sammaytuhā [sammaytuhā] 'Ḥilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu ʻanhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl' ..."
Secundo folio of Ḥilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu fīhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl: wa-lawlā al-huwīyah la-ẓaharat al-ānīyah.

Incipit of al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yalzamu ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ (folio 55b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-ʻawnī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadiya lawlā an hadānā Allāh. Lammā qāla Allāh taʻālá li-Nabīyihi, ʻalayhi al-salām: 'Wa-andhir ʻashīrataka al-aqrabīn', daʻá Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, qarābatahu wa-waqaf ʻalá al-Ṣuffá [al-Ṣuffah], wa-akhadha yundhiruhum, wa-yaqūlu mā umira bi-hi an yaqūla, ʻalá mā dhakarahu Muslim fī Ṣaḥīḥih ..."
Secundo folio of al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yalzamu ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ: an tundhirahum wa-li-kawnihim min al-Muslimīn.

Incipit of Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam (folio 75b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad Sayyid al-Mursalīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ʻayyana al-aʻyān bi-fayḍihi al-aqdas al-aqdam, wa-qaddarahā bi-ʻilmihi fī ghayb dhātihi wa-tammam, wa-laṭafa bi-rashsh nūr al-tajallī ʻalayhā wa-anʻam, wa-aẓharahā bi-mafātīḥ khazāʼin al-jūd wa-al-karam ʻan makāmin al-ghuyūb wa-mafāwiz al-ʻadam ..."
Secundo folio of Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam: barakat anfāsihi wa-anāra bi-maʻārifihi.

Incipit of Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm (folio 111b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Lā ilāha illā Allāh, ʻuddah li-liqāʼ Allāh. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, nabīyihi wa-ʻabdih. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, mustariqq al-Ḥaḍrah al-Ilāhīyah, khatama Allāh la-hu bi-al-ḥusná: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ḥayy al-qayyūm, al-muqsim bi-mawāqiʻ al-nujūm, wāhib al-ḥikam al-Rabbānīyah, asrār al-arwāḥ fī ghiyābāt al-jusūm, min al-ḥaḍarāt al-ʻulá ilá taḥt al-tukhūm, fayyāḍ al-nūr al-fāṣil bayna ahl al-himam wa-al-rusūm, yuʼtī al-ḥikmah man yashāʼu min ʻibādihi, lā bi-sharṭ maʻlūm ..."
Secundo folio of Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm: al-salīm wa-al-muttaṣif bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl.

Incipit of Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ (folio 191b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī infarada bi-al-ʻizzah wa-al-baqāʼ, wa-tawaḥḥada bi-al-ʻaẓamah wa-al-kibriyāʼ, wa-tamajjada bi-al-rifʻah wa-al-sanāʼ, wa-taqaddasa ʻan al-nuẓarāʼ wa-al-sharikāʼ, wa-tanazzaha ʻan al-wālid wa-al-abnāʼ, al-mutafaḍḍil bi-al-niʻam wa-al-ālāʼ, la-hu al-ḥamd wa-al-shukr, maʻa aṭyab al-thanāʼ, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb ittakhadhtuhu mawʻiẓatan li-nafsī, wa-arjū, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, nafʻahu yawma ramsī, wa-anā sāʼilun akhā naẓarin fīhi an yadʻwa lī wa-li-wālidayya wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, inna raḥmat Allāh qarībun min al-muḥsinīn ..."
Secundo folio of Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ: fa-innahu yarāka, al-Ḥadīth bi-ṭūlih.

Incipit of Ithbāt al-wājib (folio 261b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tajallá bi-dhātihi li-dhātih, fa-taʻayyana fī bāṭin ʻilmihi majālī dhātih wa-ṣifātuh, thumma inʻakasat āthār tilka al-majālī ilá ẓāhirihi fī al-bāṭin, fa-ṣārat al-waḥdah kathrah, kamā nushāhidu wa-nuʻāyin, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá nabīyihi alladhī bi-hi rajaʻat tilka al-kathrah ilá waḥdatihā al-ūlá, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi alladhīna lahum fī wirāthat hādhihi al-faḍīlah yadun ṭūlá. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi risālah fī taḥqīq madhhab al-ṣūfīyah wa-al-mutakallimīn wa-al-ḥukamāʼ al-mutaqaddimīn wa-taqrīr aqwālihim fī wujūd al-wājib li-dhātihi, wa-ḥaqāʼiq asmāʼihi wa-ṣifātih, wa-kayfīyat ṣudūr al-kathrah ʻan waḥdatih, min ghayr nuqṣān fī kamāl qudsihi wa-ʻizzatih, wa-mā yatbaʻu dhālika min mabāḥith ukhar yuʼaddī ilayhi al-fikr wa-al-naẓar ..."
Secundo folio of Ithbāt al-wājib: hiya hādhihi al-ḥiṣaṣ.

Incipit Maqūlāt Ibn al-ʻArabī (folio 276b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻārif billāh, al-wāqif ʻalá asrārih, Muḥyī al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-ʻazīz: al-Iḥāṭah bi-ʻilm al-asmāʼ in jāʼat fī al-kashf li-aḥad, lā yuʻawwalu ʻalayhā. al-Ikhlāṣ alladhī lā yuʻṭī al-ḥikmah lā yuʻawwalu ʻalayh. al-Iḥtirām bi-ghayr khidmah lā yuʻawwalu ʻlayhi. al-Adab, in lam tajmaʻ bayna al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal, lā yuʻawwalu ʻalayhi ..."
Secundo folio of Maqūlāt Ibn al-ʻArabī: al-tajalliyāt al-muṭābiqah li-amthilatihā.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; red leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Zahr al-fāʼiḥ fīman tanazzaha ʻan al-dhunūb wa-al-qabāʼiḥ, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-zāhid al-ʻābid Ibn Makkī [sic], taghammadahu Allāh taʻālá bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-riḍwān wa-askanahu aʻlá ghuraf al-jinān, bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-yalīhi: Sharḥ Waḥdat al-wujūd lil-Nābulusī. Wa-yalīhi: Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kalim fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam lil-Qayṣarī. Wa-yalīhi: Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm, li-Sayyidī al-Shaykh al-Akbar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh. Wa-yalīhi: Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ lil-ʻAllāmah Nabhān. Wa-yalīhi: Ithbāt al-wujūd lil-Jāmī. Wa-yalīhi: Kalām nafīs lil-Shaykh al-Akbar."
On folio 1a: A reader's note: "Ṭālaʻahu al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Yāfī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. 14 M, sanat 68."
On folio 1a: "Yā Kubaykij. Yā Ḥafīẓ. Iḥbis. Iḥbis. Iḥbis."
On folio 1a: Three illegible seals.
On folio 48a: "Risālat Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah li-ahl al-irādah, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Akbar, Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī, qaddasa Allāh sirrah. Āmīn."

On folio 51a: "Ḥilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu ʻanhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-rabbānī, wa-al-quṭb al-ṣamadānī, Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn ʻArabī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-ʻazīz. Āmīn."

At the bottom of folio 54b, after the colophon of "Ḥilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu ʻanhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl": Three quotations about "ṣiffat al-Abdāl" (charachteristics of 'al-Abdāl', i.e., those of the highest rank of Ṣūfī "awliyāʼ" (holy men)), from three Ṣūfī sources: from an anonymous author, from Ibrāhīm al-Khawwāṣ (Ibrāhīm ibn Aḥmad, died 291/904), and from Sahl ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Tustarī (818 or 819-896?).
On folio 55a: "Risālat al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yalzamu ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ, lil-Shaykh al-Imām Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-ʻArabī, qaddasa Allāh sirrah."
On folio 72a: scribbled quotations.
On folio 77a: "... Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf Dāwūd ibn Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad al-Qayṣarī ... wa-sammaytu hādhā al-kitāb bi-Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam ..."

On the margin of folio 109b: A note by ʻUmar al-ʻAṭṭār al-Dimashqī stating that he studied the epistle "Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam" with his teacher al-Shaykh Muḥammad Mawlawī Akram al-Afghānī, in the year 1279 of the Hijrah (1862/1863), and that he recorded on the margins of the epistle the explanations of his teacher, in addition to his own ideas that although the world is old and exists from time immemorial, that does not mean that it will not come to an end.
On folio 110a: A short commentary by an anonymous author on "Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam".

On folio 111a: "Kitāb Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm lil-Shaykh al-Akbar, wa-al-kibrīt al-aḥmar, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, wa-al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Muḥyī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-ʻArabī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu al-ʻazīz, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. M."

On folio 189b, at the end of the colophon, an anonymous reader quotes from "Bāb al-Ṭahārah" of "al-Futūḥāt al-Makkīyah", stating that Ibn al-ʻArabī authored his book 'Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm' in a period of eleven days, during Ramaḍān, the year 595 (July/August, 1199), in al-Marīyah (Almería, Spain): "... anna hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm, qad qayydahu [Ibn al-ʻArabī] fī iḥdá [aḥad] ʻashar yawman, fī Ramaḍān, bi-al-Marīyah, sanat khams wa-tisʻīn wa-khams miʼah."

On folio 190a: A quotation from Ibn al-ʻArabī and a quotation from a fatwá by Majd al-Dīn al-Fīrūzābādī (Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb, 1329-1414 or 1415), about the doctrines of Ibn al-ʻArabī and whether his books are legitimate to be read, stating that Ibn al-ʻArabī is a highly revered and learned scholar: "... Innahu kāna shaykh al-ṭarīqah, ḥālan wa-ʻilman, wa-imām al-taḥqīq ḥaqīqatan wa-rasman, wa-muḥyī rusūm al-maʻārif fiʻlan wa-rasman ..."

On folio 191a: "Kitāb Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ, jamʻ al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ḥabr al-humām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-mudaqqiq al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-marḥūm al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Salām al-Ṣūfī al-shahīr bi-nasabihi al-mubārak bi-Ibn al-Shaykh Nabhān, al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh [al-hu] wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."
On folio 261a: "Ithbāt al-wājib lil-Jāmī."

Colophon of al-Zahr al-fāʼiḥ fī man tanazzaha ʻan al-dhunūb wa-al-qabāʼiḥ (folio 27a): "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá raḥmat man ilayhi al-maʻād, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-li-ikhwānihi wa-muḥibbīhi wa-li-muʼallif hādhā al-kitāb wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt ajmaʻīn, wa-li-man raʼá fīhi khalalan fa-aṣlaḥahu, fa-inna al-kātib laysa bi-maʻṣūm min al-ghalaṭ, wa-li-man naẓara fī hādhā al-kitāb bi-muṭālaʻah wa-daʻā li-kātibihi bi-al-ʻafw wa-al-ghufrān. Fī awāʼil Jumād al-Thānī, sanat 1174. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of al-Zahr al-fāʼiḥ fī man tanazzaha ʻan al-dhunūb wa-al-qabāʼiḥ: "The book is completed by the praise of God, His help and his abundant benevolence, by the hand of the poorest of the servants and the neediest to the mercy of Him, who to Him is the returning, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, may God forgive him, his parents, his masters, his brethren, his beloved, the author of this book, all Muslim men and women, him who sees a deficiency in the book and corrects it, because the copyist is not infallible from error, and he who reads this book and invokes God to forgive and pardon its copyist. Dated the beginning of Jumād al-Thānī, 1174 [of the Hijrah = 8 January, 1761]. It is completed."

Colophon of al-Ẓill al-mamdūd fī maʻná waḥdat al-wujūd (folio 45b): "Qāla muṣannifuhu, ḥafiẓahu Allāh taʻālá: Ḥarrarnāhu fī ṣabīḥat yawm al-Aḥad al-tāsiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min Jumādá al-Ākhir, sanat khams wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, ḥāmidan wa-muṣalliyan wa-musalliman. Wa-kadhālika wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah ṣabīḥat yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, sādis ʻasharī Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat ithnayn wa-sabʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn al-Ṭabbākh."

Translation of the colophon of al-Ẓill al-mamdūd fī maʻná waḥdat al-wujūd: "Its author, may God, Most High, protect him, said: I authored it the morning of Sunday, 29 Jumāda̐ al-Ākhir, 1125 [of the Hijrah = 23 July, 1713], praising [God] and praying. This noble copy was completed on the morning of blessed Saturday morning, 16 [probably 26] Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1172 [of the Hijrah = 21 July, 1759], by the hand of the poor Muḥammad ibn al-Ṭabbākh."

Colophon of Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah li-ahl al-Iradah (folio 50b): "Tammat Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqhi, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tammat. M."

Translation of the colophon of Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah li-ahl al-Iradah: "Kīmiyāʼ al-saʻādah is completed by the praise of God and His abundant benevolence. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace."

Colophon of Ḥilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu ʻanhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl (folio 54b): "Tammat al-Ḥilyah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-mannih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn. Wa-raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻan aṣḥāb Rasūl Allāh ajmaʻīn."

Translation of Hilyat al-abdāl wa-mā yaẓharu ʻanhā min al-maʻārif wa-al-aḥwāl: "al-Ḥilyah is completed by the praise of God and his benevolence. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. Amen. May God be pleased with the companions of the Messenger of God."

Colophon of al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yalzamu ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ from (folio 71a): "Tammat Risālat al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yajibu ʻalá ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá, Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Baytamānī, fī shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sant tisʻ wa-sittīn wa-alf. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yalzamu ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ: "The epistle of al-Muḥkam al-marbūṭ fīmā yajibu ʻalá ahl ṭarīq Allāh min al-shurūṭ is copied by the hand of the poor to God Most High, Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Baytamānī, in the month of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, 1069 [August/September, 1659]. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. Amen. Amen."

Colophon of Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam (folio 109b): "Tammat hādhihi al-risālah ʻalá yad aḥqar ʻibād Allāh wa-aḍʻafihim al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, fī awāl [awāʼil] Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1177."

Translation of the colophon of Maṭlaʻ khuṣūṣ al-kilam fī maʻānī al-gharāʼib fī Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam: "This epistle is copied by the hand of the most despised and the weakest among the servants of God, the poor Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, the beginning of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1177 [of the Hijrah = 2 May, 1764]."

Colophon of Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm (folio 189b): "Tamma al-kitāb 'Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm' ʻalá yad aḍʻaf al-ʻibād ilá Allāh, wa-aqallihim ʻamalan, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, al-Dimashqī baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Khalwatī ṭarīqatan, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu bi-mannihi wa-jūdih wa-karamih. Āmīn. Wa-dhālika nahār al-Khamīs, 13 Ṣafar, sanat 1170."

Translation of Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm: "The book of 'Mawāqiʻ al-nujūm' was copied by the hand of weakest of the servants of God and the least working among them, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, al-Dimashqī baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Khalwatī ṭarīqatan, may God forgive him according to His benevolence, His Goodness and His generosity. Amen. On Thursday, 13 [probably 23] Ṣafar, 1170 [of the Hijrah = 17 November, 1756]."

Colophon of Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ (folio 260a): "Tamma al-kitāb, bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, al-mawsūm bi-Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ, ʻalá yad al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, fī salkh Jumādá al-Ūlá, sanat 1173."

Translation of the colophon of Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ: "The book titled Ṣalāḥ al-arwāḥ wa-al-ṭarīq ilá dār al-falāḥ, was completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King, by the hand of the poor who admits his inequity and deficiency, Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Ṭabbākh, may God forgive him, his parents, and all Muslims, at the end of Jumādá al-Ūlá, the year 1173 [of the Hijrah = 19 January, 1760]."
Colophon of Ithbāt al-wājib: "Tammat bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb."
Translation of the colophon of Ithbāt al-wājib: "It is completed by the help of God, the Abundant Giving King."
Colophon of Maqūlāt Ibn al-ʻArabī: "Tamma al-kalām bi-idhn al-Malik al-ʻAllām, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Muḥammad al-Ṭabbākh, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbih."

Translation of the colophon of Maqūlāt Ibn al-ʻArabī: "The discourse is completed by the permission of the All Knowing King, by the hand of the poor Muḥammad al-Ṭabbākh, who aspires for the forgiveness of his Lord."

record.title: Some recollections of past events : typescript photocopy / by Francis McCarty Newton.
record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī : manuscript / Najm al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-aʻin bi-khayr. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadī lawlā an hadānā Allāh subḥānuhu min ilāh munazzah ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ, munfarid bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl, ghanī ʻammā siwāhu, ḥamdan yuwāfī niʻamah wa-yukāfī mazīdah, wa-ashkuruhu idh alhamanā tawḥīdahu wa-taʻẓīmahu wa-tamjīdah, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh ... Wa-baʻd, fa-inna aʻẓam al-ʻulūm wa-aʻlāhā wa-aqwamahā ḥujjatan wa-ajlāhā ʻilm uṣūl al-dīn al-musammá bi-ʻilm al-kalām, al-bāḥith ʻan dhāt al-ṣāniʻ wa-mā la-hu min ṣifāt al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām, wa-inna mimmā ullifa fīhi al-qaṣīdah al-fāʼiqat al-mabānī wa-al-maʻrūfah bi-Qaṣīdat al-Shaybānī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-asbagha ʻalayhim niʻamah.
15 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14 cm; 20 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins; the verses of ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī preceded by the letter Ṣ, and the commentary preceded by the letter Sh in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-mutqin al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq, farīd al-dahr wa-waḥīd al-ʻaṣr, muftī al-Muslimīn, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, Najm al-Dīn Abī al-Faḍl ibn al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, muftī al-Muslimīn, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, aqḍā al-quḍāh, Walī al-Dīn ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn al-Shāfiʻī, nafaʻa Allāh al-Muslimīn bi-ʻulūmihi wa-fawāʼidihi, wa-taghammadahu bi-raḥmatihi, wa-raḍiya ʻanhu wa-ʻan athlāfihi [aslāfihi]. Āmīn. Tamm."

On folio 1a: Three ownership statements, as follows: 1. "Qad dakhalat fī mulk Muḥammad al-Ṭāhā al-Ḥājj ʻAlī. 1271." 2. "Qad malaka hādhā al-kitāb min faḍl Rabbihi al-majīd Ṭālib ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUbayd fī sanat 1242." 3. "Mulk al-faqīr Saʻd al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Saʻdī."

On folio 2a: "... wa-ḥīna kāna hādhā al-sharḥ, fīmā ẓahar lanā, awwal sharḥ ullifa ʻalayhā maʻa wafāʼihi bi-ḥall maqāṣidihā wa-ibrāzihi al-maʻānī al-mustakinnah ladayhā nāsaba an yusammá Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī ..."
On folios 39a-40b are recorded the dates of birth and death of several people in the Hijrī years: 1264, 1247, 1249, 1251, 1259, 1245.

On the right margin of folio 32b: Ownership statement: "Malakah al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr ʻĀrif ibn al-Sayyid Maḥmūd al-Ḥalawānī, raḥiamhu Allāh bi-jāh Sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn."
On folio 40b: Ownership statement: "Hādhā mulk al-Shaykh Saʻd al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Saʻdī."

Qaṣidat al-Shaybānī starts with: "Sa-aḥmadu Rabbī ṭāʻatan wa-taʻabbudā // wa-anẓimu ʻiqdan fī al-ʻaqīdati awḥadā," and ends with "Ka-dhāka salāmu Allāhi thumma riḍāʼuhu // ʻalá al-āli wa-al-azwāji wa-al-ṣaḥbi sarmadā."

Author's colophon: "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir mā aradtu īrādahu fī hādhā al-sharḥ al-mubārak, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi muʼallifahu wa-kātibahu wa-qārīhi, wa-ghafara lahum wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-raḥmah, wa-li-sāʼir al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Tamm."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Let this be the end of what I wanted to introduce in this blessed commentary. May God benefit by it its author, its copyist and its reader, and forgive him who beseeches God to forgive them and have mercy upon them, and all Muslims. Amen. It is completed."

record.title: 880-02 Shams al-maʻārif al-kubrá : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Būnī.
record.note: Title from cover.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Shahādat azal, fa-min nūr hādhihi al-shahādah ightarafa al-muṣannifūn ʻilman. Fa-ifham dhālik. Wa-al-tartīb al-abadī fī al-shahādatayn al-muttaṣilatayn bi-al-malāʼikah al-kirām. Wa-awwal al-ʻilm fa-hādhihi shahādat al-abad. Fa-man fahima sirr hātayn al-shahādatayn shāhad al-malakūtayn wa-mā awdaʻāhu bi-sirr al-ittiṣāl bi-al-kashfīyāt ..."
Secundo folio: Ammā baʻd, fa-lil-ḥaqq aʻlām.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 20 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In green cardboard cover and dark brown paper on the spine.

In naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; many illustrations and magic squares; text within double frames; catchwords. At the head of the opening page of each of the four parts is a decorative design.
On cover: "Shams al-maʻārif al-kubrá", printed in silver.

On page 1 of al-Juzʼ al-awwal: "Shams al-maʻārif al-kubrá wa-laṭāʼif al-ʻawārif, fī arbaʻat ajzāʼ, lil-Quṭb al-Imām Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Būnī, wa-bi-nihāyat al-arbaʻat kutub, [al-kutub] al-ātiyah: 1. Kitāb Mīzān al-ʻadl fī maqāṣid aḥkām al-raml. 2. Kitāb Fawātiḥ al-raghāʼib fī khuṣūṣīyāt awqāt al-kawākib. 3. Kitāb Zahr al-murūj fī dalāʼil al-burūj. 4. Kitāb Laṭāʼif al-ishārah fī khaṣāʼiṣ al-kawākib al-sayyārah." "Maṭbūʻ ʻalá al-nuskhah al-Hindīyah al-aṣlīyah." These four books are not included in this codex and seem to serve as an advertisement for works to follow.
al-Juzʼ al-thānī (Part two), starts with: "al-Faṣl al-khāmis ʻashar. Fī al-shurūṭ al-lāzimah li-baʻḍ dūna baʻḍ fī al-bidāyāt wa-al-nihāyāt."
al-Juzʼ al-thālith (Part three), starts, after al-Basmalah, with: "al-Faṣl al-ḥādī wa-al-ʻishrūn. Fī Asmāʼ Allāh al-Ḥusná, wa-anmāṭihā, wa-mā li-kull namaṭ min al-daʻawāt."
al-Juzʼ al-rābiʻ (Part four), starts, after al-Basmalah, with: "al-Faṣl al-thāmin wa-al-thalāthūn. Fī istikhdāmāt al-ḥurūf wa-khalawātihā."

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb Shams al-maʻārif al-kubrá lil-Imām al-Būnī fī ʻishrīn min Shawwāl, sanat 1291 Hijrīyah. Wa-lammā kādat shams ṭabʻihā tabzughu lil-ṭulūʻ arrakhahā baʻḍ al-madmīyīn [al-mādiḥīn] bi-qawlihi, shiʻr [in Ḥisāb al-jummal (Alphabetical reckoninig)]: ... Wa-fīhā ará al-tārīkh jāda bi-qawlihi // yufīdu al-amānī ṭabʻu Shams al-maʻārif. Sanat 1291."

Translation of the colophon: "The book 'Shams al-maʻārif al-kubrá' of al-Imām al-Būnī was completed on 20 Shawwal, 1291 of the Hijrah [30 November, 1874]. When the sun of its printing started to rise, someone praised it and mentioned the date of printing, in verse [using Ḥisāb al-jummal "Alphabetical reckoning"], saying: ... In it I see the date, saying generously: The printing of Shams al-maʻarif satisfies the wishes. The year 1291."

record.title: Charles Nichols letter, Fort Steilacoom, Washington, to William R. Thomas, 1861 May 9 : manuscript.
record.note: Letter is accompanied by a manuscript transcript made by an unidentified transcriber.

record.title: William Martin Johnson album of poetry and correspondence : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Accompanied by a printout of an electronic copy of John Howard Payne, "Our Neglected Poets--William Martin Johnson," originally pubished in the United States Democratic Review, 1838.
Accompanied by a printout of a description by James Arsenault & company, including a complete list of Johnson's poems by title.
Five ink silhouette portraits by Johnson on front pastedown and front flyleaf. Three identified in Johnson's hand as Samuel Johnson, Nancy Symmes, and Anna Evelina Johnson; two unidentified.
Annotated on recto of front flyleaf: "Property of W. M. Johnson of Colum. College."
Annotated on recto of front flyleaf in a different hand: "Wm. M. Johnson died at Jamaica, L. I. Thursday morning 5 o'clock the 21 September 1797."
Binding: contemporary quarter-calf over marbled boards; binding very worn, spine split.

record.title: Commonplace book.
record.note: Bound in contemporary green gilt-tooled morocco.

record.title: Edward Otho Cresap Ord letter to an unidentified recipient, 1849 : manuscript.
record.note: Letter is accompanied by a typed transcript made by an unidentified transcriber.

record.title: Nouvelles eclaircissemens sur la baguette divinatoire ... : manuscript.
record.note: Title from title page.
Book stamp of Jacques-Antoine Rabaut-Pommier on title page.
Binding: stiff parchment.
Annotations dated "1862" in another unidentified hand on front pastedown.

record.title: Appraisement of the late Revd. Mr. Henry Mordaunt's furniture, &c. : manuscript.
record.note: Title from front wrapper.
Signed at the foot of the last page: "Appraised 13th and 14th days of July, 1778 by Henry Parker."
Binding: original gray wrapper.

record.title: Susanna Potter commonplace book : with contributions from the family of Frederick Christian Lewis.
record.note: Bound in contemporary 19th-century gilt-tooled morocco; rebacked.

record.title: Catherine Hamilton commonplace book.
record.note: Bound in contemporary red half morocco and marbled boards; original clasps partially intact.

record.title: "Portrait of Anna Seward by John Opie, R.A." : manuscript.
record.note: Caption title.
Bound in green cloth with title on front cover stamped in gold. Wtih envelope bound at end of text, now empty. Persumably it formerly housed a print after the painting by Opie.
Written on laid paper with watermaker: Etruria Italy.

record.title: Manuscript memoirs of the great Earl of Cork : manuscript.
record.note: Second leaf incorrectly bound in at the end of the manuscript.
Manuscript docketed on the verso of leaf 2: "I got this paper from my friend Mangin of the Castle," possibly in the hand of Thomas Campbell.
Title from album title page.
Spine title in gilt: "MS Memoir of the Great Earl of Cork."
Laid in: small typed bookseller description and what appears to be a typed exhibit slip.
Binding: late nineteenth-century half vellum over brown cloth boards; gilt oval armorial stamp of Francis Clements Crossie on both covers.

record.title: Autobiography of Harry B. Price : typescript.
record.note: Title from title page.

record.title: Letters relaying observations of Jamaica to Lord Cornbury and the Duchess of Queensbury, 1738 November 26 : manuscript.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
Provenance: Earl of Clarendon, Holywell House, Hampshire.

record.title: William Whitehead's poem to the Duchess of Queensbury, 1777.
record.note: Title from dealer's description.
Provenance: Earl of Clarendon, Holywell House, Hampshire.

record.title: Earl of Drumlanrig letters to the Duchess of Queensbury and Charles Douglas from Turin and Lisbon, 1755 November 5 and 8, 1748 June 18.
record.note: Title devised by cataloger.
With an additional scrap with docket: Letter from Lord Charles Douglas to the Ds. of Queensbury after the earthquake of Lisbon 1755,

record.title: 880-03 Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrī : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma innā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā ʻallamta min bayān wa-alhamta min al-tibyān, kamā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā asbaghta min al-ʻaṭāʼ wa-asbalta min al-ghiṭāʼ, wa-nalūdhu bi-ka min shiddat al-lasan wa-fuḍūl al-hadhar, ka-mā naʻūdhu bi-ka min maʻarrat al-lakan wa-fuḍūḥ al-ḥaṣar, wa-nastakfī bi-ka al-iftinān bi-iṭrāʼ al-mādiḥ wa-ighḍāʼ al-musāmiḥ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-lisānan mutaḥalliyan bi-al-ṣidq.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 8.3 x 16 cm; 13-21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; covers and flap embossed with central medallion.

In fair and good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in bold script; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; text fully vocalized; catchwords; the first 26 leaves are written in a different hand.

On folio 1a: Ownership statements, as follows: "Dalāl bint Naṣrī Dallāl", "Min kutub al-faqīr Jibrāʼīl ʻAbd Allāh Dallāl [1836 or 1837-1892 or 1893]. Sanat 1882", "Dakhala bi-rasm mālikihi Anṭūn Jibrāʼīl Dallāl", "Thumma ṣāra min kutub al-faqīr Jibrāʼīl ʻAbd Allāh Dallāl bi-Ḥalab, sanat 1889", On the seal: "Min mumtalakāt Jibrāʼīl ʻAbd Allāh Dallāl. Sanat 1859", Two illegible seals.
At the head of text on folio 1b: A decorative design in red.
Folios 179b-180a and folio 181 are blank.
On folio 180b: An index of the titles of the fifty Maqamahs.

Colophon (folio 179a): "Najazat hādhihi al-Maqāmāt al-khamsūn bi-asrihā, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi, ʻalá [yad] afqar ʻibād Allāh wa-aḥwajihim ilayh, Aḥmad al-ʻUbaydī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon: "The fifty Maqāmahs are all completed. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and his family. Copied by the poorest of the servants of God and the neediest to Him, Aḥmad al-ʻUbaydī, may God forgive him and his parents and him who beseech God to forgive him. Amen. Amen. Amen. It is completed."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAṭṭār ʻalá al-Maqūlāt : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Yaqūlu Abū al-Saʻādāt Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAṭṭār: Innī lammā waḍaʻtu al-ḥāshiyatayn, al-kubrá ʻalá Maqūlāt al-ʻallāmah al-Sayyid al-Bulaydī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, thumma sharaʻtu fī Maqūlāt Shaykhinā al-ʻallāmah al-Sujāʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, waḍaʻtu ʻalayhā ḥāshiyah waqaʻa fīhā baʻḍ ṣuʻūbah, lā tunāsibu al-mubtadī, wa-kāna yaẓharu lī baʻda al-mukālamah maʻa al-ikhwān umūr ghayr masṭūrah fī al-ḥāshiyah, fa-khift ḍayāʻahā, fa-qaṣadtu bi-waḍʻ hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah ḥall ʻibārat al-matn bi-qadr al-imkān ..."
Secundo folio: ayḍan bi-an yuqāla hādhā al-kitāb.
17 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18 cm; 23-25 lines per page.
Binding: In violet buckram cover with flap (in 4 unnumbered quires).
In fair and naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAṭṭār ʻalá al-Maqūlāt."

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah kitābatan bi-qalam al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-qadīr, al-dhalīl al-ḥaqīr Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Munīrī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn, qurba al-ẓuhr, yawm al-Thalāth al-mubārak, alladhī huwa tāsiʻ shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wāḥid wa-tisʻīn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. M."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed by the poor to his Mighty Lord, the submissive and despised, Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Munīrī al-Shāfiʻī, may God forgive him, his parents and the Muslims, around noon, on blessed Tuesday, 9 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, 1291 [of the Hijrah = 26 May, 1874]. May peace be upon the messengers. Praise be to God, Lord of the Universe. Amen. M."

record.title: 880-02 al-Rawḍ al-bāsim fī shamāʼil al-Muṣṭafá Abī al-Qāsim : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥsana ilá Rasūlihi al-shamāʼil, wa-aqām ʻalá nubūwatihi awḍaḥ al-muʻjizāt wa-atamm al-dalāʼil, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi al-amāthil wa-ṣaḥbihi al-afāḍil, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn mā ṭalaʻ najmun afal. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-qadīr ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāh Allāh sharra kull munāwin wa-muʻādī: Hādhihi ʻujālah wajīzah ikhtaṣartu fīhā Shamāʼil al-Imām al-Tirmidhī, wa-zidtu ʻalayhā akthar min mithlihi, fa-mā kāna min takhrījihi ṣaddartu bi-hi al-bāb wa-lam unsibhu ilá mukhrij, wa-taraktu al-ʻalāmah ʻalāmah, wa-mā kāna min al-mazīd ʻazawtuhu ilá mukhrijihi wa-iftataḥtuhu bi-qawlī qultu, wa-akhtimuhu bi-qawlī wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-sammaytuhu al-Rawḍ al-bāsim fī shamāʼil al-Muṣṭafá Abī al-Qāsim ..."
Secundo folio: fī liwāʼihi wa-rāyatih.
14 x 20.8 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 6 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Rawḍ al-bāsim fī shamāʼil Abī al-Qāsim. Yashtamilu ʻalá sabʻīn bāban, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, ʻAbd al-Raʼūf al-Munāwī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-riḍwān, wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakatihi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Tamm." "Wa-yatlūhu Manāqib al-Imām al-aʻẓam al-Imām Muḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, la-hu ayḍan. Wa-yatlūhu Isfār al-badr ʻan laylat al-qadr, la-hu ayḍan. Wa-yatlūhu al-Shamāʼil lil-Tirmidhī <lil-Tirmidhī>. Wa-yatlūhu al-Itḥāfāt al-sanīyah la-hu ayḍan. Raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn. Tamm."
On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa hādhā al-kitāb lillāh taʻālá Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī." "Jumlat mā fīhi arbaʻ kutub."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Min kutub Muḥammad al-Aḥdab."
On folios 1b-3a: The author lists the titles of the seventy chapters (abwāb) of his book.

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb al-Shamāʼil al-sharīfah al-mubārakah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman ilá yawm al-dīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The book of the noble and blessed al-Shamāʼil is completed by the praise of God, His help and his abundant benevolence. May God pray our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant and continiuous peace until Judgement Day."

record.title: 880-03 al-Shamāʼil : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá al-Tirmidhī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ḥāfiẓ Abū ʻĪsá Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá ibn Sūrah al-Tirmidhī al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Bāb mā jāʼa fī khalq al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Akhbaranā Abū Rajāʼ Qutaybah ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Saʻīd ʻan Mālik ibn Anas ʻan Rabīʻah ibn Abī ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻan Anas ibn Mālik annahu samiʻahu yaqūlu: Kāna Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, laysa bi-al-ṭawīl al-bāʼin, wa-lā bi-al-qaṣīr, wa-lā bi-al-abyaḍ al-amhaq, wa-lā bi-al-ādam, wa-lā bi-al-jaʻad al-qaṭaṭ, wa-lā bi-al-sabaṭ, baʻathahu Allāh ʻalá raʼs arbaʻīn sanah ..."
Secundo folio: Muslim ibn Harmadh ʻan Nāfiʻ.
15 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15.5 cm; 21-23 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap. Covers and flap embossed with central medallion and decorative frame.
In fair naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings in red; numerous notes and corrections on the margins in different hands; catchwords.
On the label pasted to the front cover: "Ḥadīth al-Tirmidhī fī al-Shamāʼil."
On the back of the preliminary leaf: "Mukhtaṣar al-Tirmidhī fī al-Shamāʼil. Ḥadīth."
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Shamāʼil al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, lil-Imām al-Tirmidhī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn."
On folio 1a, in curde hand: Numerous quotations, proverbs and maxims.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah laylat al-Thalāth, thālith shahr Rabīʻ al-awwal, sanat tisʻ wa-arbaʻīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá al-Malik al-Wahhāb, Muḥammad al-Safjadjī ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed on Tuesday night, 3 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1049 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [4 July, 1639], may the best of prayer and peace be upon him, by the poorest of the servants to the Abundant Giving King, Muḥammad al-Safjadjī ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims. Amen. Amen. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-03 al-Manẓūmah al-Jazāʼirīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jazāʼirī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi wa-huwa al-wāḥid al-azalī // subḥānuhu jalla ʻan shibhin wa-ʻan mathali. Fa-laysa yuḥṣá alladhī awlāhu min niʻamin // ajalluhā niʻmatu al-īmān bi-al-rusuli ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-qīla in qallada al-Qurʼāna ṣaḥḥa la-hu.
21.5 x 15.7 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Kitāb al-Manẓūmah al-Lāmīyah fī al-ʻaqāʼid, ʻAqīdat al-Shaykh Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Jazāʼirī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-adkhalahu al-Jannah bi-mannihi wa-karamih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn. M."
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá Muḥammad Sayyid Aḥmad ʻAzzāz. M."

al-Manẓūmah al-Jazāʼirīyah ends with: "ʻAlayhi azká ṣalāt Allāhi thumma ʻalá // kulli al-nabīyīna fī al-iṣbāḥi wa-al-uṣuli. Wa-al-āli wa-al-ṣuḥbi thumma al-tābiʻīn lahum // mimman ʻani al-ḥaqqi wa-al-iḥsāni lam yaḥuli."
Colophon: "Tammat al-Jazāʼirīyah al-mubārakah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātihā. Āmīn. Āmīn."
Translation of the colophon: "The blessed al-Jazāʼirīyah is concluded by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. May God benefit us by its blessings. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 Nubdhah laṭīfah fī ḥall mushkilāt ḥaḍarat fī al-suʼālāt : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.
record.note: Title from incipit.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, ʻumdat al-sālikīn wa-shaykh al-muḥaqqiqīn, ḥujjat al-Islām, Shihāb al-Dīn, Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqallānī al-Shāfiʻī, Shaykh al-Ḥaram, ḥāwī al-ḥikam: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, Nubdhah laṭīfah fī ḥall mushkilāt ḥaḍarat fī suʼālāt nuqilat min al-kutub al-muṣannafāt, mithl al-Iḥyāʼ wa-al-Tabṣirah, wa-ghayrihā min al-kutub al-muʻtabarah, lam takun qabla dhālika mufaṣṣalah wa-lā mubayyanah, fa-lammā ʻuriḍat ʻalaynā awḍaḥnā tilka al-masāʼil al-sharīfah bi-al-dalāʼil al-laṭīfah wa-al-akhbār al-munīfah ..."
Secundo folio: am kayfa al-ḥāl wa-hal yaṣilu aḥad.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Nubdhah laṭīfah fī al-kalām ʻalá asʼilah rufiʻat li-Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, khātimat al-ḥuffāẓ wa-al-muḥaddithīn, al-Shihāb Ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqallānī al-Shāfiʻī, fīmā yataʻallaqu bi-ḥāl al-mayyit fī qabrih, min ḥīn mufāraqat al-dunyā wa-nuzūlihi fīhi ilá al-baʻth, fa-ajāba, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu. M."
On folio 1a, in the upper right corner, in pencil: "Yā Kubaykij."

On folio 8b: An invocation by an owner: "Allāhumma ighfir li-mālikihi wa-li-wālidayh, wa-li-man sabaqa min uṣūli uṣūl wa-furūʻi furūʻ, wa-li-mashāyikhinā, wa-li-man ṣāfaḥanā wa-ṣāfaḥnāh, wa-irḍa ʻannā wa-ʻanhum, wa-raḍiya ʻannā Nabīyunā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, wa-jamīʻ al-aqṭāb wa-Aṣḥāb al-Nawbah."

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-masāʼil bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihā yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, fī awwal shahr Jumād al-Thānī alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 119 [1119], ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Āmīn. Āmīn. M."

Translation of the colophon: "These questions are completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. Copied on blessed Thursday, the beginning of Jumād al-Thānī, of the year 119 [probably 1190 of the Hijrah of the Prophet = 18 July, 1776], may the best of prayer and peace be upon him. M."

record.title: 880-02 al-Aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmiṣah : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharraʻa lanā dīnan qayyiman, ghayra dhī ʻiwaj, wa-kallafanā bi-mā lam yajʻal ʻalaynā fīhi min ḥaraj, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmah lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi qudwat al-nāsikīn wa-ʻumdat al-mutaṭahhirīn, wa-ṣaḥābatihi aʼimmat al-dīn wa-al-tābiʻīn bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn. wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muḍṭarr ilá karam Allāh dhī al-minan Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-jalī wa-al-khafī, wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-ikhwānihi wa-al-Muslimīn: Hādhihi nubdhah yasīrah, jawāb li-ḥādithah shahīrah, sammaytuhā al-Aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmiṣah, jamaʻtuhā ijābah li-ṭālibihā ..."
Secundo folio: li-maḥall al-ḥimmiṣah infitāḥ.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 8 x 13 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "al-Aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmiṣah, lil-ʻallāmah al-humām Sayyidī Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī al-Wafāʼī."
At head of title on folio 1a: "Hādhihi al-risālah al-rābiʻah."
On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa lillāh taʻālá hādhā al-kitāb Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī."
Folio 6 is blank.
Colophon (folio 5a): "Intahá taʼlīfuhā fī awāʼil shahr al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanat tisʻ wa-khamsīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh."

Translation of the colophon: "It was authored in the beginning of the month of al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, the year 1059 of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best prayer and peace be upon him. It is completed by the praise of God."

record.title: 880-01 Ḥayāt al-qulūb : manuscript.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh [alladhī] hadānā ilá dīn al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-anām, Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi al-risālah ʻilm al-dīn, jamaʻtuhu min kutub al-mutafarriqīn, wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ḥayāt al-qulūb, li-mā yazūlu bi-hi ʻilal al-jahl wa-al-dhunūb, wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá sabʻat abwāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb ..."
Secundo folio: fa-kull muyassar li-mā khuliqa lahu.
15 x 21 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some notes and corrections on the margins and interlinear; an insert between leaf 9b and 10a; many wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1a: "Ḥayāt al-qulūb."
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb sanat 1099."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed in the year 1099 [of the Hijrah = 1687/1688]."

record.title: 880-01 Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Mayurūqī.
record.note: Title of Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb from folio 3a.
Title of Ḥikāyāt ʻan baʻḍ al-mutaqaddimīn from folio 35a.
Title of Kamālat al-durr al-nafīs fī al-radd ʻalá al-laʻīn Iblīs from folio 36a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb (folio 1b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, Abū al-Ghayth Muḥammad al-Qashshāshī [or al-Qushāshī]: Lammā naẓartu hādhā al-taʼlīf al-ʻajīb wa-ʻalimtu mā fīhi min al-uslūb al-gharīb, wa-kāna min al-muqarrar fī al-maʻqūl wa-al-manqūl anna al-inṣāf awlá wa-aḥaqq mā taʻāṭathu ayādī al-fuḥūl, bādartu ilá imtithāl mā kāna ḥaqqan ʻalayya, wa-shahidtu bi-ḥusnihi ʻalá an yakūna min ṣāliḥ ʻamal bayna yadayya, fa-qultu: Mā aḥaqqa hādhā al-taʼlīf al-mubārak an tusammá [yusammá] 'Taḥīyat al-asrār taʼlīf al-anṣār fī al-radd ʻalá al-Naṣārá min firaq al-kuffār' ..."
Secundo folio of Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb: al-khayrāt mūriqah bi-saḥāʼib raʼfatih.

Incipit of Ḥikāyāt ʻan baʻḍ al-mutaqaddimīn (folio 35a): "Ḥaká Ibn ʻAsākir anna Yaʻqūb al-Mājashūn, jadd ʻAbd al-Malik, ṣāḥib Mālik, mātā [māta] wa-wajiʻa fī al-sarīr, wa-ijtamaʻa al-nās lil-ṣalāh ʻalayhi, fa-wajada al-ghāsil ʻirqan taḥta rijlihi yataḥarraku, fa-qāla: Ará an yuʼakhkhara ghasluhu ilá ghad. Fa-lammā aṣbaḥū wa-ijtamaʻa al-nās ʻalayhi wa-jadahu al-ghāsil kadhālika ..."

Incipit of Kamālat al-durr al-nafīs fī al-radd ʻalá al-laʻīn Iblīs (folio 36a): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan lillāh subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá man lā nabīya baʻdah. Ammā baʻd, faqad dhakara al-Jalāl al-Suyūṭī fī kitābihi 'al-Kanz al-madfūn wa-al-fulk al-mashḥūn', qāl: Li-ʻilm hādhihi al-shubhah allatī dhakarahā Iblīs, laʻanahu Allāh, min qawlihi 'Anā khayr minhu, khalaqtanī min nār wa-khalaqtahu min ṭīn', innamā dhakarahā ʻalá sabīl al-taʻannut, wa-illā fa-imtināʻuhu min al-sujūd li-Ādam, ʻalayhi al-salām, innamā kāna ʻan kibar wa-kufr, wa-mujarrad ibāʼ wa-ḥasad, wa-maʻa dhālik, fa-mā abdāhu min al-shubhah fa-huwa dāḥiḍ, li-annahu rattaba ʻalá dhālik annahu khayr min Ādam ..."
Secundo folio of Kamālat al-durr al-nafīs fī al-radd ʻalá al-laʻīn Iblīs: min awṣāf al-arḍ fī al-Qurʼān.
16.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 10 x 16.5 cm; 22-24 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with brown leather spine.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; some corrections on the margins in pencil; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Taḥīyat al-asrār taʼlīf al-akhyār al-anṣār fī al-radd ʻalá al-Naṣārá min firaq al-kuffār, wa-ayḍan tusammá Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb, taʼlīf al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Mayurūqī, min madīnat Mayurūqah, athābahu Allāh al-Jannah. Āmīn"
At the head of folio 35a: "Hādhihi Ḥikāyāt ʻan baʻḍ al-mutaqaddimīn."
At the head of folio 36a: "Hādhihi Kamālat al-durr al-nafīs fī al-radd ʻalá al-laʻīn Iblīs."
Colophon of Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb: "Ghafara Allāh wa-ʻafá ʻan kātibihi wa-muʼallifihi wa-qārīhi ilá abad al-ābidīn. Āmīn."
Translation of the colophon of: Tuḥfat al-adīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb: "May God forgive its copyist, its author and its reader, forever and ever. Amen."
Colophon of Ḥikāyāt ʻan baʻḍ al-mutaqaddimīn: No colophon.

Colophon of Kamālat al-durr al-nafīs fī al-radd ʻalá al-laʻīn Iblīs: "Intahá mā yassara Allāh taʻālá jamʻahu fī hādhihi al-māddah fī ḍuḥá yawm al-Sabt, al-muwāfiq 9 khalat min shahr Jumād Awwal, sanat 1303, alf wa-thalāthumiʼah wa-thalāthah baʻd al-Hijrah [al-Nabawīyah] ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá [yad] kātibihi, al-faqīr ilá Mawlāh, Makkāwī al-Sayyid, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon of Kamālāt al-durr al-nafīs fī al-radd ʻalá al-laʻīn Iblīs: "Completed is what God Most High facilitated of the compilation of this material on the morning of Saturday, 9 Jumādd Awwal, 1303 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [13 February, 1886], may the best of prayer and peace be upon him, by the hand of its copyist, the poor to his Lord, Makkāwī al-Sayyid, may God forgive him, his parents, and all Muslim men and women, the living among them and the dead. May God pray on our Master and Lord, Muḥammad, on his family and companions and grant them peace. Amen. Praise be to God, Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.
record.note: Title from folio incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khātim al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-ṭāhirīn wa-ṣaḥābatihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ghanī Abū al-Ikhlāṣ Ḥasan al-Wafāʼī al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī: Innahu iltamasa minnī baʻḍ al-akhillāʼ, ʻāmalanā Allāh wa-īyāhum bi-luṭfihi al-khafī, an aʻmala muqaddimah fī al-ʻibādāt, tuqarribu ʻalá al-mubtadī mā tashattata min al-masāʼil fī al-muṭawwalāt, fa-istaʻantu billāh wa-ajabtuhu ṭāliban lil-thawāb, wa-lā adhkuru illā mā jazama bi-ṣiḥḥatihi ahl al-tarjīḥ min ghayr iṭnāb, wa-sammaytuhu 'Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ṭāhir muṭahhar makrūh.
14.2 x 20 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 13.3 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good and thick naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; some corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ lil-ʻAllāmah al-fāḍil al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak, tāsiʻ ʻashar yawman khalat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-wāḥid wa-sabʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh [wa-al-taslīm]."
Translation of the colophon: "This copy was completed on blessed Saturday, 19 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1271 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [10 December, 1854], may the best of prayer [and peace] be upon him."

record.title: Scrapbook of newspaper clippings from Liverpool newspapers concerning the trial of Queen Caroline : printed text.
record.note: Some clippings folded, others bound in; contemporary half roan morocco binding.

record.title: 880-02 Sirāj al-muṣallī wa-badr al-mubtadī wa-al-muntahī : manuscript / Burkawi Muḥammad Afandī.
record.note: Title from incipit folio(folio 2b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Iʻlam asʻadaka Allāh fī al-dārayn: Dhukira fī al-Fatāwá al-kabīrah, wa-al-Fatāwá al-Nāṣirī, wa-al-Fatāwá al-Shihābī, wa-al-Ṣalāh al-Saʻūdī, man lam yaʻrif farāʼiḍ al-wuḍūʼ wa-ghasl aʻḍāʼihi al-thalāthah kāmilan, wa-masḥ rubʻ al-raʼs, yajūzu wuḍūʼuhu maʻa al-karāhīyah, li-ʻadam taʻallum al-farāʼiḍ, wa-man lam yaʻlam farāʼiḍ al-ṣalāh, wa-lam yatruk shayʼan min al-sharāʼiṭ wa-al-arkān wa-al-wājibāt yajūzu ṣalātuhu maʻa al-karāhiyah, li-ʻadam taʻallumihā wa-huwa ithm ..."
Secundo folio: sunan kamā asanna fiʻlahā.
14.8 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 7 x 13.3 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Sirāj al-muṣallī."
On folio 2b: "Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Sirāj al-muṣallī wa-badr al-mubtadī wa-al-muntahī."
Colophon: "Tammat al-risālah al-musammá Sirāj al-muṣallī al-mansūb ilá al-marḥūm, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayh, Burkawī Muḥammad Afandī. Ṣadaqa Allāh al-ʻaẓīm. Tārīkh sanat thamāniyah wa-tisʻīn wa-alf. 1098."

Translation of the colophon: "Completed is the epistle titled 'Sirāj al-muṣallī' which is attributed to the late, Burkawī Muḥammad Afandī, may God have mercy upon him. God is Most Truthful. Dated in the year 1098 [of the Hijrah = 1686/1687]."

record.title: 880-01 Tuḥfat al-arīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Mayurūqī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣanā bi-khayr al-adyān, wa-jaʻalanā min ummat al-Furqān, wa-akramanā bi-tilāwat al-Qurʼān, wa-ṣawm shahr Ramaḍān, wa-al-ṭawāf ḥawla al-Bayt al-Ḥarām, wa-al-rukūʻ ʻinda al-Rukn wa-al-Maqām, wa-sharrafanā bi-Laylat al-Qadr, wa-al-wuqūf bi-ʻArafāt, wa-jaʻalanā min ahl al-ṭahārah wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-zakāh ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Tarjumān, jaʻala Allāh maḍjiʻahu wa-maʼwāhu fasīḥ al-jinān ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá ʻĪsá ʻalayhi al-salām.
16.5 x 25 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 18 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; brown leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some headings in red; markings in purple; some notes and corrections on the margins in pencil; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Tuḥfat al-arīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb ʻalá al-tamām."
On folio 2a: "... sammaytuhu Tuḥfat al-arīb fī al-radd ʻalá ahl al-ṣalīb ..."

Colophon: "Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá Yawm al-Dīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "God suffices us, He is the best advocate. There is no power nor might except in God, the Most High, the All Powerful. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace until Judgment Day. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-murīd ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Bājūrī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-munfarid bi-al-iʻdām wa-al-ījād, al-munazzah ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ wa-al-aḍdād, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-qadīm, al-khāliq li-mā ʻadāh min al-kāʼināt, al-bāqī, wa-hālik kull mā ʻadāh min al-makhlūqāt ..."
Secundo folio: minhā duraran nafīsah.
16.7 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 17.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In black buckram (in 17 numbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some corrections and many notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Bājūrī ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd bi-al-tamām wa-al-kamāl."
On folio 2a: "... wa-qad sammaytuhā Tuḥfat al-murīd ʻalá Jawhart al-tawḥīd ..."

On folios 150a-152b: Some quotations from an undientified source by al-Munāwī (could not be identified), in a different hand: "Qāla al-Munāwī fī ḥarf al-Hamzah, fī sharḥ Ḥadīth 'Iḥmilū fī ṭalab al-dunyā', ay uṭlubū al-rizq ṭalaban jamīlan ..."
On folio 172b, in a different hand, a discourse about the eight major Islamic sects: al-Muʻtazilah, al-Shīʻah, al-Khawārij, al-Murjiʼh, al-Nijārīyah, al-Jabrīyah, al-Mushabbihah, al-Nājiyah.
Folio 173 is blank.

Colophon: "Qāla al-muʼallif al-ʻallāmah al-humām wa-al-ruḥalah al-fahhām: Qad wāfaqa al-kamāl laylat al-Khamīs al-mubārak fī awāʼil shahr Ṣafar alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-arbaʻ wa-thalāthīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-taḥīyah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam, kullamā dhakarahu al-dhākirūn wa-ghafila ʻan dhikrih al-ghāfilūn. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-kitāb yawm al-Arbaʻ, ibtidāʼ shahr Jumād al-Awwal alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1259, tisʻah wa-khamsūn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf. M. Kātibuhu al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-qadīr Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Khāliq, ghafara Allāh lah."

Translation of the colophon: "The author, the judicious scholar and the energetic journeyer said: The treatise was completed on the night of blessed Thursday, the beginning of Ṣafar, 1234 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [probably 4 Ṣafar, 1234 = 3 December, 1818], may the best prayer and peace be upon him. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace, as long as he is remembered by those who remember him and as long as he is forgotten to be remembered by those who forget to remember him. Copied on Wednesday, the beginning of Jumād al-Awwal, 1259 [30 May, 1843] by the poor to his All Mighty Lord, Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Khāliq, may God forgive him."

record.title: 880-02 Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī : manuscript / Najm al-Dīn Abū al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn.
record.note: Title of Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī from folio 1b.
Title of Sharḥ badʼ al-amālī supplied by cataloger.
Title of Sharḥ Mukhtasar ʻalá al-ʻaqīdah al-musammah Badʼ al-amālī from folio 59a.
Title of ʻUmdat al-aḥkām from folio 79a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā li-hādhā, wa-mā kunnā li-nahtadī lawlā an hadānā Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá min ilāh munazzah ʻan shawāʼib al-naqṣ, mutafarrid bi-ṣifāt al-kamāl, ghanī ʻammā siwāhu ... Ammā baʻd, fa-inna aʻẓam al-ʻulūm wa-aʻlāhā wa-aqwamahā ḥujjatan wa-ajlāhā ʻilm uṣūl al-dīn, al-musammá bi-ʻilm al-kalām, al-bāḥith ʻan dhāt al-ṣāniʻ wa-mā la-hu min ṣifāt al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām, wa-inna mimmā ullifa fīhi al-qaṣīdah al-fāʼiqat al-mabānī wa-al-maʻrūfah bi-Qaṣīdat al-Shaybānī ..."
Secundo folio for Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī: yamnaʻu ʻan mā huwa aṣl.

Incipit of Sharḥ badʼ al-amālī (folio 28a): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwāna illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Nabīyih Muḥammad, khātim al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-akramīn ajmaʻīn. Qāla al-muṣannif: Yaqūlu al-ʻabdu fī Badʼ al-amālī // li-tawḥīdin ka-naẓmin ka-al-laʼāli. Iʻlam inna muftataḥ kull bāb yanbaghī an yakūna muwashshaḥan bi-taḥmīd Allāh, muzayyanan bi-al-thanāʼ ʻalá Rasūlih ..."
Secundo folio for Sharḥ Badʼ al-amālī: waḥdahu aw lā fa-lā.

Incipit of Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-ʻaqīdah al-musammāh Badʼ al-amālī (folio 59b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Yaqūlu al-ʻabdu fī Badʼ al-amālī // li-tawḥīdin ka-naẓmin ka-al-laʼālī. al-Murād bi-al-ʻabd nafsuhu. al-Badʼ al-ibtidāʼ. al-Amālī jamʻ al-imlāʼ, wa-huwa al-katb ʻan ẓahr al-qalb min ghayr istiʻānah bi-kitāb. al-Murād bi-al-tawḥīd tawḥīd Allāh taʻālá, wa-huwa al-iqrār bi-al-lisān wa-al-taṣdīq bi-al-jinān annahu fī ḥadd dhātihi wāḥid fī ṣifātih ..."
Secundo folio for Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-ʻaqīdah al-musammāh Badʼ al-amālī: ibtidāʼ wa-lā wāsiṭah bayna al-nafy wa-al-ithbāt.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 11 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.

Incipit of al-ʻUmdat al-aḥkām (folio 79b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla Mawlānā al-ṣadr al-Imām muqtadá al-anām fī al-ayyām, ḥabr al-ummah, baḥr al-Sunnah, majmaʻ al-iftāʼ wa-al-irshād, ḥujjat Allāh ʻalá al-ʻibād, muḥaqqiq al-maʻānī, muqarrir al-mabānī, kāshif al-daqāʼiq, mubayyin al-ḥaqāʼiq, ḥāfiẓ al-ḥaqq wa-al-millah wa-al-dīn, ṣadr al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, sulṭān ʻulamāʼ al-sharq wa-al-ṣīn, wārith ʻulūm al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Nasafī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu: Jamaʻtu fī hādhā al-mukhtaṣar ʻumdat ʻaqīdat Ahl al-Sunnah wa-al-Jamāʻah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum, ijābah lil-sāʼilīn wa-ṣawnan lahum ʻan ʻaqāʼid al-mubṭilīn ..."
Secundo folio of al-ʻUmdat al-aḥkām: khilāfan lil-Muʻtazilah li-kawnihi manāṭ al-taklīf.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap, dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a, at the upper right corner, in red: "Sharḥ al-ʻAqīdah al-Shaybānīyah, li-Shaykh al-Islām Ibn Qāḍī ʻAjlūn, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá."

On folio 1b: "... wa-ḥīna kāna hādhā al-sharḥ, fīmā ẓahara lanā, awwal sharḥ ullifa ʻalayhā, maʻa wafāʼihi bi-ḥall maqāṣidihā, wa-ibrāzihi al-maʻānī al-mustakinnah ladayhā, nāsaba an yusammá Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī ..."
At the lower right margin of folio 27b: "Balagha muqābalatan bi-ḥasab al-ṭāqah."

Qaṣidat al-Shaybānī starts with: "Sa-aḥmadu Rabbī ṭāʻatan wa-taʻabbudā // wa-anẓimu ʻiqdan fī al-ʻaqīdati awḥadā," and ends with "Ka-dhāka salāmu Allāhi thumma riḍāʼuhu // ʻalá al-āli wa-al-azwāji wa-al-ṣaḥbi sarmadā."
al-Ūshī's poem ends with: "Wa-innī al-Ḥaqqa adʻū kulla waqtin // li-man bi-al-khayri yawman qad daʻānī."

At the upper right corner of folio 28a, in red: "Ṣannafa hādhihi al-risālah fī al-tawḥīd al-mashhūrah bi-Yaqūlu al-ʻabd lil-Imām [al-Imām] al-fāḍil, Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Sirāj al-Dīn, al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Shahīdī al-Ūshī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá."
At the lower right margin of folio 58b: "Balagha muqābalatan bi-ḥasab al-ṭāqah."
On folio 59a: "Hādhā Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-ʻAqīdah al-musammāh Badʼ al-amālī."
On folio 79a: "Kitāb ʻUmdat al-aḥkām lil-Nasafī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl."

Colophon of Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī (folio 27b): "Wa-li-yakun hādhā ākhir mā aradtu īradahu fī hādhā al-sharḥ al-mubārak, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi muʼallifahu wa-kātibahu wa-qāriyahu, wa-ghafara la-hum wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-raḥmah, wa-li-sāyir al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn, bi-raḥmatika, Yā Arḥam al-Rāḥimīn. Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, sanat 53."

Translation of the colophon of Badīʻ al-maʻānī fī sharḥ ʻAqīdat al-Shaybānī: "Let this be the end of what I wanted to introduce in this blessed commentary. May God benefit by it its author, its copyist and its reader. May God forgive them and him who invokes God to forgive them and bestow His mercy upon them and all Muslims, by Your mercy, O Most Merciful One. The blessed book is concluded by the praise of God, His help and his abundant benevolence. The year 53 [probably 1153 = 1740/1741]."
Colophon of Sharḥ Badʼ al-amālī (folio 58b): "Tamma al-sharḥ bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih."
Translation of the colophon of Sharḥ Badʼ al-amālī: "The commentary is completed by the praise of God and His help."

Colophon of Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar Badʼ al-amālī. No colophon. Text ends abruptly with the commentary on the verse "Wa-ḥaqqun waznu aʻmālin wa-jaryun // ʻalá matni al-Ṣirāṭi bi-lā iḥtiyāl, as follows: "... wa-al-murād bi-al-wazn mā yuʻrafu bi-hi maqādīr al-aʻmāl, li-anna al-aʻmāl aʻrāḍ tastaḥīlu [yastaḥīlu] baqāʼuhā fa-lā yūṣafu [tūṣafu] bi-al-khiffah wa-al-thiqal, lākin lammā awrada al-dalīl ʻalá thubūtihi yajibu an naʻtaqidahu wa-natawakkala [wa-nūkila] ʻilma dhālik ʻalá Allāh wa-lā nashtaghila bi-kayfīyatihi, bal naqūlu Inna Allāh taʻālá qādirun ʻalá an ..."

Colophon of ʻUmdat al-aḥkām (folio 88b): No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... Faṣl. al-Īmān billāh taʻālá farḍ ittifāqan, lākinna al-ʻaql ʻindanā ālah yuʻrafu bi-hā ḥusn al-ashyāʼ wa-qubḥuhā, wa-wujūb al-īmān wa-shukr al-munʻim, wa-al-muʻraf wa-al-mūjib ḥaqīqatan huwa Allāh, lākin bi-wāsiṭat al-ʻaql, kamā anna al-Rasūl muʻraf bi-al-wujūb, wa-al-mūjib ḥaqīqatan huwa Allāh, lākin bi-wāsiṭat al-Rasūl, ḥattá qāla Abū Ḥanīfah, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Lā ʻudhra li-aḥad fī al-jahl bi-khāliqih li-mā yurá ..."

record.title: 880-02 Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī.
record.note: Title from from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī rafaʻa li-ahl al-Sunnah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-khāfiqayn aʻlāman, wa-waḍaʻa bi-wāḍiḥ adillatihim min shubah al-mukhālifīn aʻlāman, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu, shahādatan takūnu bi-al-takhalluṣ fī al-dārayn iʻlāman, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mamnūḥ man ittabaʻahu min al-jinān aʻlāman, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih mā uyyidat qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid wa-mā ḥulliyat al-jiyād bi-jawāhir al-farāʼid. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-fānī ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Mālikī al-Laqānī, satara Allāh ʻuyūbahu wa-ghafara dhunūbahu: Kuntu qad lakhkhaṣtu mā ʻallaqahu Ustādhunā min ʻUmdat al-murīd ʻalá ʻaqīdatihi al-musammāh bi-Jawharat al-tawḥīd fī awrāq qalīlah sammaytuhā Irshād al-murīd ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa mā yuqaddamu ʻalá al-shurūʻ.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9.7 x 16.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the verses of Jawharat al-tawḥīd in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ibrāhīm al-Laqānī al-Mālikī ʻalá Jawharat al-tawḥīd, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Tamm."
On folio 1a: Ownership statement: "Min minan mā munna bi-hi ʻalá al-faqīr Sharaf al-Dīn ibn Abī Bakr Ṣaghīr Mubāriz, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu."
On folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'Itḥāf al-murīd bi-Jawharah al-tawḥīd'."
"Jawhart al-tawḥīd" starts with: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá ṣilātihi // thumma ṣalāt Allāh maʻa ṣalāmihi."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with the commentary on the verse "Wa-jāʼizun fī ḥaqqihim ka-al-akli // wa-ka-al-jimāʻ lil-nisāʼi fī al-ḥilli", as follows: "... wa-lammā kānū min al-bashar wa-ursilū ilá al-bashar kānat ẓawāhiruhum khāliṣah lil-basharīyah, yajūzu ʻalayhā mā yajūzu min al-āfāt wa-al-taghyīrāt mā yajūzu ʻalá bashar, wa-hādhā lā naqīṣata fīhi, wa-ammā bawātinuhum fa-munazzahah ghāliban ʻan dhālik, maʻṣūmah minh, mutaʻalliqah bi-al-malaʼ al-aʻlá wa-al-malāʼikah li-akhdhihā ʻanhum, wa-talaqqīhā al-waḥy minhum. Thumma sharaʻa fī bayān mā ajmalahu min al-manṭūq bi-hi fī qawlihi 'Wa-al-nuṭqu fī [fīhi] al-khulfu bi-al-taḥqīqi' fa-qal: Wa-jāmiʻ maʻná wa-huwa mā ..."

record.title: 880-02 Selections from the Qurʼān : manuscript.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Sūrat al-Ṣāffāt. Miʼah wa-thamānūn wa-āyatān. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-al-Ṣāffāti ṣaffan fa-al-zājirāti zajran fa-al-tāliyāti dhikran inna ilāhakum la-wāḥidun ..."
Secundo folio: wa-yaskharūn wa-idhā dhukkirū lā yadhkurūn.
On folio 11b: A reader's note: "Katabahu Muḥammad fī 16 Rabīʻ [?] Awwal, sanat 1214 [18 August, 1799]."
17.5 x 26 cm; written surface: 12 x 17; 7 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding, covers embossed with central medallion and tooled with decorative frame.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink on white paper; vowels in red; the surāhs headings in gold with the vowels in blue; text within double red frame; the verses are not numbered.
Colophon: No colophon.

record.title: 880-02 Zahrat al-riyāḍ wa-nuzhat al-qulūb al-mirāḍ : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Dāʼūd al-Saqsīnī.
record.note: Title from colophon.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Starts with: "... ruʼyatī. Qālū al-ruʼyah lā yanāluhā aḥad illā an yakūna mithl al-Kalīm fī ṣifātihi wa-nubūwatih, wa-maqām mithl Ṭūr Sīnā, fa-yanqaṭiʻu ṭamaʻ al-ʻuṣāh. Fa-qāla Yā Mūsá, lan tarānī ḥattạ yajtamiʻa al-ʻuṣāh kulluhum fī al-Jannah, fa-aqūlu hal jāʼa al-ʻuṣāh kulluhum, fa-yaqūlu al-malāʼikah naʻam qad jāʼū, fa-aqūlu hal baqiya minhum aḥad, fa-yaqūlūn lā, fa-aqūlu irfaʻū al-ḥujub ʻanhum li-yarawnī bi-lā kayf, fa-yarānī al-ʻuṣāh wa-al-muṭīʻ fī waqt wāḥid li-karāmatihim ʻalá ikhwānī ..."
Secundo folio: fa-kharaja ghāziyan fa-hal tadullunī.
17.5 x 26.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 20 cm; 19 lines per page.

Binding: Modern binding. In black buckram cover with dark brown leather spine on which is printed in gold: The title "Zahrat al-riyāḍ", the number of the volume "2", and the name of the owner "Nūr al-Dīn Muṣṭafá".
In good and large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "al-Niṣf al-thānī min Zahrat al-riyāḍ wa-nuzhat al-qulūb al-mirāḍ."

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements, as follows: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdahu. Min niʻam Allāh al-qadīr ʻalá ʻabdihi al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Muʼaqqit bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Kabīr bi-Ḥalab. Sanat 1099 [1687/1688]." An illegible seal. "Dakhala fī silk mulk al-Sayyid Muḥammad Hāshim ibn al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Muʼaqqit. Sanat 1237 [1821/1822]."

Colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah al-musammāh bi-'Zahrat al-riyāḍ wa-nuzhat al-qulūb al-mirāḍ' ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-dhalīl, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-qadīr, Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAltāz al-Jīzī, fī ʻāshir shahr al-Muḥarram, sanat aḥad wa-tisʻimiʼah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam." And on the right margin of the colophon: "Naqalahā lil-Shaykh Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad. Wa-nusikha kulluhu min al-nuskhah al-mubārakah al-muʼarrakhah fī sanat arbaʻīn wa-sabʻimiʼah al-Nabawīyah, mulk al-Shaykh <al-Shaykh> Shihāb al-Dīn [... ... ...] wa-qūbila wa-ṣuḥḥiḥa ʻalá qadr al-wisʻ wa-al-ṭāqah, wa-jaʻalahā Allāh taʻālá mubārakan ʻalayh, wa-nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-barakāt muṣannifihā. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-sallama taslīman kathīran."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy called 'Zahrat al-riyāḍ wa-nuzhat al-qulūb al-mirāḍ' was completed by the poor and humble servant, who aspires for the forgiveness of his mighty Lord, Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf ibn ʻAltāz al-Jīzī, on 10 Muḥarram, 901 [of the Hijrah = 9 October, 1495]. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and his family and grant them peace. And on the right margin of the colophon: "He copied it for al-Shaykh Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad. All of it was copied from the blessed copy, dated in the year 740 of the Prophet [1339/1340], owned by al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn [... ... ...]. It was collated and corrected, as much as possible and to the best of ability; may God, Most High, render it a blessing on him, and May God, Most High, benefit us by the blessings of its author. May God pray on Muḥammad and grant him abundant peace."

record.title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Mukaffirāt lil-Badr al-Rashīd : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The first four lines are water damaged and illegible: "... Iʻlam anna al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah al-maʻrūf bi-al-Badr al-Rashīd, raḥimahu Allāh, min al-aʼimmah al-Ḥanafīyah, jamaʻa akthar al-kalimāt al-kufrīyah bi-al-ishārah al-īmāʼīyah, fa-hā anā ubayyinu rumūzahā, wa-ubayyinu kunūzahā, wa-aḥullu ghumūḍahā, wa-uḥallī ḥumūḍahā, fa-fī al-Ḥāwī al-fatāwī [lil-fatāwī]: Man kafara bi-al-lisān wa-qalbuhu muṭmaʼinn bi-al-īmān fa-huwa kāfir wa-laysa bi-muʼmin ʻinda Allāh taʻālá. Intahá. Wa-huwa maʻlūm min mafhūm qawlihi taʻālá: Man kafara billāh min baʻdi īmānihi illā man ukriha wa-qalbuhu muṭmaʼinn bi-al-īmān, wa-lākin man sharaḥa bi-al-kufr ṣadran fa-ʻalayhim ghaḍab min Allāh ..."
Secundo folio: wāʻiẓ aw mudarris aw muṣannif.
11.5 x 17.5 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather with green central medallion; cover heavily damaged.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text within red frame; catchwords.
