record.title: 880-02 al-Jawāhir al-sanīyah fī al-nisbah wa-al-karāmāt al-Aḥmadīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ṣamad ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Miṣrī.
record.note: Title from folio 3a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa anwār al-Aḥmadīyah fī samāʼ al-shuhūd, wa-jalā jamālahā fī mirʼāt al-wujūd, fa-ashraqat anwāruhā ḥattá iqtabasa minhā kull mawjūd, wa-iktasaba min kamāl jamālihā man huwa min ahl al-kalām wa-al-kamāl wa-al-qabūl wa-al-iqbāl maʻdūd. Aḥmaduhu an āwānā ilá rukn shadīd qawī, wa-anhalanā min al-manhal al-ʻadhb al-rawī al-Aḥmadī, wa-awradanā baḥran mustamaddan min al-fayḍ al-Nabawī, minhu jamīʻ al-ʻālamīn tartawī ..."
Secundo folio: al-Aḥmadīyah fa-ḥarrakat aghṣān qudūd al-mushtāqīn.
15.3 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 16.5 cm; 22-24 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; black cloth on spine and flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb al-Jawāhir al-sanīyah fī al-nisbah wa-al-karāmāt al-Aḥmadīyah, raḥima Allāh muʼallifahā wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn."
On folio 3a: "... wa-sammaytuhā: bi-al-Jawāhir al-sanīyah fī al-nisbah wa-al-karāmāt al-Aḥmadīyah ..."

On folio 81a: A statement by a former copyist/devotee of the Aḥmadīyah Sufi order, dated Friday, 18 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, 1016 of the Hijrah (4 April, 1608), at a certain Sufi "khalwah" (hermitage), in Mecca: "... Qāla dhālika wa-katabahu muḥibb al-qawm wa-khādim al-fuqarāʼ ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ ibn Aḥmad al-Sunbulī [?] al-Khawādhimī [?], taḥrīran fī yawm al-Jumʻah, thāmin shahr [ʻashar] al-Ḥijjah al-ḥarām, ʻām sittata ʻashar baʻda al-alaf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-dhālika bi-mahbiṭ waḥī Allāh al-ʻAẓīm, bi-al-khalwah allatī bi-Makkah, sharrafahā Allāh taʻālá, majmaʻ [...] al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Fa-nasʼalu Allāh al-tawfīq fī al-qawl wa-al-ʻamal, wa-an yuʻīdhanā min al-khaṭaʼ wa-al-zalal wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

On the right margin of the colophon (folio 83a): Statements from two readers, as follows: "Hādhā ʻUmar Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Razzāq ibn al-Shaykh Ḥamzah al-Aḥmadī, fī shahr Jumād al-Ākhir alladhī huwa min shuhūr al-thalāthīn wa-miʼah wa-alf [1130 min al-Hijrah = May, 1718]." "Naẓara fīhi al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-aḥwaj ilá Allāh subḥānah wa-taʻālá, ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhi wa-daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah wa-ilá jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat al-Jawāhir al-sanīyah yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ, tāsiʻ yawm min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1130, ʻalá yad afqar al-wará, Ḥasan al-Aḥmadī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-man qaraʼa la-hu al-Fātiḥah, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of 'al-Jawāhir al-sanīyah' was completed on Wednesday, 9 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1130 [of the Hijrah = 10 February, 1718] by the hand of the poorest of mankind, Ḥasan al-Aḥmadī, may God forgive him, his parents, him who recites the 'Fātiḥah' on his behalf and all Muslim men and women, the living among them and the dead. Amen. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-01 Sharḥ al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā tuḥṣī niʻamuhu jamīʻ al-ḥussāb. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb. Hādhā ḥall laṭīf li-muqaddimat al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb yakshifu ʻan wajhihā al-ḥijāb, wa-yujlī maʻāniyahā lil-aḥbāb, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi al-ṭullāb. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, ay, Abtadiʼu. Wa-al-ism min al-sumū, ay, al-ʻulū, wa-qīla min al-wasm, ay, al-ʻalāmah. Wa-Allāh ʻalam lil-dhāt al-wājib al-wujūd. Wa-al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, ismān maʼkhūdhān min al-raḥmah, wa-hiya, lughatan, riqqat al-qalb, taqtaḍī al-tafaḍḍul, fa-huwa ghāyatuhā al-muʻtabar bihā hunā. Ammā baʻd, hiya lil-intiqāl min uslūb ilá ākhar, ay, mahmā yakun min shayʼ baʻda ḥamd Allāh al-sābiq lafẓan ..."
Secundo folio: al-ṣalāh, wa-hiya min Allāh raḥmah.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb" in red; catchwords.

On the back of the front cover: A list of nine titles, as follows: 1. Tuḥfat al-mulūk. 2. Abū al-Muntahá [Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maghnīsāwī, -1591 or 1592). 3. Sirāj al-muṣallī. 4. Muʻaddal al-ṣalāh. 5. Risālat Kabhadānī (?). 6. Waṣīyat al-Imām al-Aʻẓam. 7. Risālah fī bayān al-īmān al-ijmālī wa-al-tafṣīlī. 8. Ḥayāt al-qulūb. 9. Risālat al-ibtilā bi-al-mashrūʻ [...] (?).
On the back of the front cover: An ownership statement: "Dakhala fī mulk al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Raḥīm al-Jaʻmaʻī [?], sanat 1170, fī shahr Shaʻbān [April/May, 1757]. Thamanuhu [...] 3."

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Sharḥ 'al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb', taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-fāḍil al-ʻumdah, al-Shaykh Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn al-Hāyim, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih, bi-jāh Muḥammad wa-ālih. Āmīn. Wa-ḥamdunā lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

On folio 1a: Ownership statement: "Fī mulk al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, ʻabduhu Ṣadaqah ibn al-Shaykh ʻAbd Rabbih al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn."
At the end of the colophon: An invocation/supplication in four verses of poetry attributed to the well-known Abbasid poet Abū Nuwās (approximately 756-approximately 810).

"Sharḥ al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb" ends with: "... Fa-hādhā al-qadr al-muqtaṣar ʻalayhi fī hādhā al-mukhtaṣar al-musammá bi-al-Nuzʹhah mimmā lā yastaṭīʻ al-ṭālib al-muḥaṣṣil jahlahu, li-annahu min ahamm al-muhimmāt. Wa-man arāda al-ziyādah ʻalá dhālik fa-yakfīhi aṣluhu, al-musammá bi-al-Murshidah. Wa-man rāma al-tabaḥḥur fī al-taṣarruf fī istikhrāj al-majhūl min al-aʻdād al-mutanāsibah, fa-ʻalayhi bi-al-Maʻūnah, lil-muṣannif, allatī fāqat kutub hādhā al-fann qāṭibatan. Wa-lillāh al-ḥamd awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan, subḥānahu, lā nuḥṣī thanāʼan ʻalayhi kamā athná ʻalá nafsihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

Colophon: "Tamma 'Sharḥ al-Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb', taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-fāḍil al-ʻumdah, al-Shaykh Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn al-Hāyim, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu fasīḥ Jannatih, bi-jāh Muḥammad wa-ālih. Āmīn. Wa-ḥamdunā lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "Completed is the commentary on 'al--Nuzʹhah fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb', of the learned scholar and honorable authority, al-Shaykh al-Imām, Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn al-Hāyim, may God shield him with His mercy and make him dwell in His spacious Paradise, by the intercession of Muḥammad and his family. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and on his family and companions and grant them peace."

record.title: 880-02 al-Taʻrīfāt : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ḥaqqa ḥamdih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi taʻrīfāt jamaʻtuhā, wa-iṣṭilāḥāt akhadhtuhā min kutub al-qawm, wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá ḥurūf al-hijāʼ, min al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ ilá al-Yāʼ, tasʹhīlan tanāwuluhā lil-ṭālibīn wa-taysīran taʻāṭīhā lil-rāghibīn. Wa-Allāh al-hādī wa-ʻalayhi iʻtimādī fī mabdaʼī wa-maʻādī. Bāb al-Alif wa-al-Bāʼ. al-Ibtidāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: al-taḍādd in kānā wujūd bayyin.
13 x 17.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 12.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In dark blue cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap (in 9.5 unnumbered quires).
In Farsī script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; many comments on the margins; catchwords.
On the label on the front cover: "9 - K. Kitāb Taʻrīfāt al-Ṣūfīyah [... ...], raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu."
At the head of folio 1b: "Kitāb Iṣṭilāḥāt wa-taʻrīfāt al-Ṣūfīyah lil-ʻĀrif [... ...]."

Colophon: "Qad tamma al-kitāb. Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhā al-kitāb fī waqt ʻaṣr Sih Shanbah, fī yawm khamsah wa-ʻishrīn, fī shahr Ramaḍān, ʻan yad al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Allāh taʻālá, Ibrāhīm ibn Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAlī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi. Wa-al-tārīkh fī hādhā al-zamān sittūn wa-tisʻimiʼah."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed. The copy of this book was finished on Tuesday afternoon, 25 Ramaḍān, by the hand of the feeble servant who is in need of the mercy of God Most High, Ibrāhīm ibn Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAlī, may God forgive him and his parents and be benevolent to them and to him. The year of this date is 960 [of the Hijrah = 14 September, 1553]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid al-sanīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Kawākibī.
record.note: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá jadduhu // subḥānahu fa-laysa yuḥṣá ḥamduh. Thumma al-ṣalātu wa-al-salāmu sarmadā // ʻalá al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá nūru al-hudá ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-idh li-ḥifẓihā lawaytu thāniyan.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Manẓūmah al-Kawākibīyah."
On folio 2a: "Fā yā lahā manẓūmatun samīyah // sammaytuhā 'al-Fawāʼid al-sanīyah'."

Colophon: No colophon. Text end abruptly with: "... Wa-al-shurbu min nahrin fa-dhā bi-al-karʻi // minhu fa-lam yaḥnath bi-ḥukmi al-Sharʻi. Bi-al-shurbi minhu bi-al-ināʼi idh ḥalaf // wa-in yaqill min māʼihi al-ḥukmu ikhtalaf. Ka-dhālika al-wālī li-kay yaʻrifuhu // bi-kulli dāʻirin atá in ḥallafahu. Bi-ḥāli ..."

record.title: 880-02 Jāmiʻ al-Fuṣūlayn : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn Isrāʼīl ibn Qāḍī Simāwnah.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: There is no "Basmalah"; the text starts with: "Wa-qad jaʻalahu al-muʼallif arbaʻīn faṣlan, wa-ʻaddahā, fa-qāl: al-Faṣl al-awwal fī masāʼil al-qaḍāʼ wa-al-ḥukūmah, wa-mā yattaṣilu bi-hi min ʻazl al-qāḍī wa-al-waṣī wa-al-wakīl wa-al-maʼmūr wa-al-rasūl, wa-fīhi mā yaṣīru bi-hi dār al-Islām dar al-ḥarb, wa-al-murtadd, wa-fīhi bayān ḥadd al-ijtihād, wa-fīhi bayān mā yakūnu ḥukman min al-qāḍī, wa-fīhi bayān naṣb al-walī wa-al-qayyim wa-al-mutawallī wa-al-waṣī, wa-fī ākhirihi rujūʻ Muḥammad [i.e. al-Ustarūshanī], raḥimahu Allāh, ʻan an yaqūl: ʻIlm al-qāḍī kabayyinah, wa-fīhi baʻḍ mā yataʻallaqu bi-al-qaḍāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ḥukmuhu wa-fīhi ḥukm ghaybat al-khaṣm.
17.2 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 17 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red cover with flap; cover embossed with central medallion (in 31 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple; some notes on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Jāmiʻ al-Fuṣūlayn, lil-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-humām, al-muḥaqqiq al-mudaqqiq, Shaykh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, Mawlānā Maḥmūd ibn Isrāʼīl, al-shahīr bi-Ibn Qāḍī Simāwnah, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakatih. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Wa-li-yakun ākhir hādhā al-kalām. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-awwāb, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sāʼir al-aṣḥāb, wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh."

Translation of the colophon: "Let this [i.e. the preceding text] be the end of the discourse. It is God who facilitates what is correct, to Him is the reference and returning. May God pray on the Amiable Prophet, on his family and all his companions and grant them abundant peace. Praise be to God."

record.title: 880-02 al-Durr al-mukhtār : sharḥ Tanwīr al-abṣār. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥaṣkafī.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Buyūʻ. Lammā faragha min ḥuqūq Allāh, al-ʻibādāt wa-al-ʻuqūbāt, sharaʻa fī ḥuqūq al-ʻibād, al-muʻāmalāt wa-munāsabatuhu lil-waqf, izālat al-mulk, lākin lā ilá mālik, wa-hunā ilayhi, fa-kānā ka-basīṭ wa-murakkab wa-jamʻ, li-kawnihi bi-iʻtibār kull min al-bayʻ wa-al-mabīʻ wa-al-thaman anwāʻan arbaʻah: Nāfidh, mawqūf, fāsid, bāṭil; wa-muqāyaḍah: Ṣarf, silm, bayʻ muṭlaq; wa-murābaḥah: Tawlīyah, waḍīʻh, musāwamah ..."
Secundo folio: ahlīyat al-mutaʻāqidayn wa-maḥalluhu al-māl.
15.8 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cover with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of "Tanwīr al-abṣār" and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-Juzʼ al-thānī min al-Durr al-mukhtār, sharḥ Tanwīr al-abṣār."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-Sharḥ al-mubārak fī yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, khāmis ʻashar yawman fī shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah thamāniyah wa-thamānīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad kātibihi al-ʻabd al-faqīr, al-muqirr bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, Ṣāliḥ ʻAbd Allāh al-Ushmūnī al-Mālikī madhhaban, al-Manfalūṭī baladan, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt. Innka samīʻun, qarībun, mujīb al-daʻawāt. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this blessed Commentary was completed on blessed Sunday, 15 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 1188 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [17 January, 1775], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him, by the hand of its copyist, the poor servant, who confesses his sin and shortcoming, Ṣāliḥ ʻAbd Allāh al-Ushmūnī al-Mālikī madhhaban, al-Manfalūṭī baladan, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslim men and Muslim women, and the believers, men and women, the living among them and the dead. Thou art the Hearing One, the Close One, the One who answers invocations. O Lord of the Universe. Amen. Amen."

record.title: 880-02 al-Ghurar al-bahīyah fī sharḥ al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah : manuscript / Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ruḥalah al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, mufīd al-ṭālibīn, ṣadr al-mudarrisīn, ḥujjat al-nāẓirīn, muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, fasaḥa Allāh fī qabrih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih, bi-Muḥammad wa-ālih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aẓhara bahjat dīnihi al-qawīm, wa-hadá man waffaqahu ilá ṣirāṭ mustaqīm, aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā anʻama wa-ʻallama wa-saddada ilá al-ṣawāb wa-qawwam. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh al-wāḥid al-qahhār, al-karīm al-ḥalīm al-sattār. Wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh wa-ṣafīyuhu wa-ḥabībuhu wa-khalīluh, ṣallá Allāh wa-sallama ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ikhwānihi min al-nabīyīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sāʼir al-ṣāliḥīn, wa-tābiʻīhim ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah fī al-fiqh lil-Imām al-muḥaqqiq, wa-al-baḥr al-mudaqqiq, Abī Ḥafṣ Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar ibn Muẓaffar ibn ʻUmar ibn Abī al-Fawāris al-Wardī, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah maʼwāh, lammā kānat min abdaʻ kitāb fī al-fiqh ṣunnif, wa-ajmaʻ mawḍūʻ fīhi ʻalá miqdār ḥajmihi ullif, ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayya min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an aḍaʻa ʻalayhā sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yubayyinu daqāʼiqahā, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahā, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahā, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik ..."
Secundo folio: al-Akram al-Wahhāb wa-sammaytuhu.
17 x 24 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 17 cm; 18-26 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in six unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 2a: "... wa-sammaytuhu al-Ghurar al-bahīyah fī sharḥ al-Bahjah al-Wardīyah ..."
Folios 53-54 are blank; text folios 1b-52b.

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... bi-an yaqūla ghufrānaka, kamā iqtaṣara ʻalayhi al-Qāḍī wa-al-Baghawī, wa-ʻabbara bi-hi al-Ḥāwī lil-ittibāʻ, rawāhu Ibn Ḥibbān wa-ghayruhu wa-ṣaḥḥaḥūhu. Wa-alladhī qāla sāʼir al-aṣḥāb: Yaqūlu ghufrānaka. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī adhhaba ʻannī al-adhá wa-ʻāfānī lil-ittibāʻ. Rawāhu al-Nasāʼī, lākinnahu ḍaʻīf, illā annahu mimmā yuʻmalu bi-hi fī faḍāʼil al-aʻmāl maʻa dhālik bi-al-ḥāl. Qāla al-Muḥibb al-Ṭabarī: Wa-yukarriru ghufranaka thalāthan ..."

record.title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 3b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 3b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, farīd dahrihi wa- waḥīd ʻaṣrih, ḥujjat al-mnāẓirīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, Muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālih. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad kuntu ikhtaṣartu 'Minhāj al-ṭālibīn' fī al-fiqh, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām Abī Zakarīyā Yaḥyá Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawawī fī kitāb sammaytuhu bi-'Manhaj al-ṭullāb', wa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayya min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an ashraḥahu sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahu, wa-yujillu ḥuffāẓahu, wa-yubayyinu murādahu, wa-yutammimu mafādahu, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik, wa-sammaytuhu bi-'Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb'. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-ism mushtaqq min al-smuw.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather with flap; cover and flap.
In good, clear and large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'Manhaj al-ṭullāb' in red; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.
On folio 1a-2b: An index of contents of the book: "Fahrasah li-Sharḥ al-Manhaj."
At the upper left corner of folio 442a: A note stating that the number of the study sessions is 168: "ʻIddat al-durūs 168."

On folio 442a: An ownership statement: "Malaka hādhihi al-nuskhah al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn Darwīsh ibn Aḥmad al-Biqāʻī baladan, al-Qādirī ṭarīqatan, al-Azʹharī ṭalaban, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, bi-mablagh qadruhu Riyālayn wa-niṣf wa-khamsah fiḍḍah faqaṭ. H."

On the left side of the colophon: Two notes by a student/auditor, stating that he studied the book with two of his teachers, on two consecutive dates, as follows: "Wa-qad tamma qirāʼat hādhā al-juzʼ, bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih, ʻalá Shaykhī wa-Ustādhī, al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Tijānī, yawm al-Aḥad, nahār tisʻah wa-ʻishrīn yawman min Jumād al-Awwal, sanat 1204 [Sunday, 14 February, 1790]." "Wa-qad tamma qirāʼh hādhā al-juzʼ ʻalá al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Shaghānibah, ḥafiẓahu Allāh, wa-fasaḥa fī muddatih, yawm al-Thulāthāʼ li-khamsat ayyām baqīna min shahr Jumād Ākhir, sanat 1208 [Tuesday, 28 January, 1794]. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

Colophon: "Tamma al-Juzʼ al-awwal min 'Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb', taʼlīf Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Shaykh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-waḥīd dahrih, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-barakātihi wa-al-Muslimīn, ʻalá yad kātibihā, wa-al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, Ṭuʻaymah Ibrāhīm al-Bulqīnī, mālikuhā. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min taʻlīq hādhā al-niṣf yawm al-Aḥad, thālith shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat 1095. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "Completed is the first part of 'Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb' of our Master and Lord, Shaykh al-Islam, the king of the distinguished scholars, the unique in his day and time, the authority of the debaters, the tongue of the eloquent ones, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī, by the hand of the poor and despised, who admits his shortcoming and deficiency, Ṭuʻaymah Ibrāhīm al-Bulqīnī, its owner. This half was completed on Sunday, 3 Rabiʻ al-Thānī, 1095 [of the Hijrah = 20 March, 1684]. Praise be to God, Lord of the Universe."

record.title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq : manuscript / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Nasafī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 2a): "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kanz al-daqāʼiq ...".
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻazza al-ʻilm fī al-aʻṣār, wa-aʻlá ḥizbahu fī al-amṣār, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-mukhtaṣṣ bi-hādhā al-faḍl al-ʻaẓīm, wa-ʻalá ālihi alladhīn fāzū minhu bi-ḥaẓẓ jasīm. Qāla Mawlānā al-ḥabr al-niḥrīr, ṣāḥib al-bayān wa-al-banān fī al-taqrīr wa-al-taḥrīr, kāshif al-mushkilāt wa-al-muʻḍilāt, mubayyin al-kināyāt wa-al-ishārāt, manbaʻ al-ʻulá, ʻalam al-hudá, afḍal al-wará, ḥāfiẓ al-ḥaqq wa-al-millah wa-al-dīn, shams al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, wārith al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Nasafī, afāḍa Allāh ʻalayhi anwār raḥmatih, wa-taghammadahu bi-maghfaratih: Lammā raʼaytu al-himam māʼilah ilá al-mukhtaṣarāt, wa-al-ṭibāʻ rāghibah fī al-muṭawwalāt aradtu an ulakhkhiṣa al-Wāfī, bi-dhikr mā ʻamma wuqūʻuh wa-kathura wujūduh li-yakthura fāʼiduh wa-yatawaffara ʻāʼiduh ..."
Secundo folio: ʻāʼidatuhu fa-sharaʻtu fīhi.
17.3 x 26.3 cm; written surface: 10 x 18 cm; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard; dark brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in large script; some notes and correction on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.
At the head of folio 1b: "Hādhā kitāb Kanz al-daqāʼiq."
Text folios 1b-127b.

On folios 128a-128b: A quotation attributed to Ibn ʻAbbās (ʻAbd Allāh ibn al-ʻAbbās, died 688?), about the virtues of one of the Psalms (could not be identified), which he rendered in 33 verses of Arabic poetry, stating that the original was in Syriac, and that it echoes "Sūrat al-Raḥmān" (Qurʼān: Sūrah 55).
Folio 129 is pasted to the back cover and contains a text on Arabic grammar.
At the right of the colophon: "Sanat khams wa-arbaʻīn wa-alf min Hijrah [al-Hijrah] al-Nabawīyah [1635 or 1636]. Tārīkh ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm."

Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb, ʻalá yad ʻabd [al-ʻabd] al-ḍaʻīf al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr, al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-laṭīf, ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻImādī, ballaghahu Allāh taʻālá fī al-dārayn āmālahumā, wa-ḍāʻafa fī al-ʻālamayn ajrahumā, sanat sitt wa-arbaʻīn wa-alf min Hijrah [al-Hijrah] al-Nabawīyah, ʻalayhi afḍal al-taḥīyah."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King, to Him is the reference and returning, by the hand of the feeble, despised and poor servant, who is in need of the mercy of his gracious Lord, ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-ʻImādī, may God Almighty fulfil the wishes of both of them in the two abodes, and double in the two worlds the reward of both of them, in the year 1046 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [1636 or 1367], may the best greeting be upon him."

record.title: 880-03 Kanz al-daqāʼiq : manuscript / Abū al-Barakāt ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad al-Nasafī.
record.note: Title from incipit (folio 1a): "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kanz al-daqāʼiq ..."
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: The beginning is missing; text starts with: "... wuqūʻuhu wa-kathura wujūduhu, li-takthura fāʼidatuhu, wa-tatawaffara ʻāʼidatuhu, fa-sharaʻtu fīhi baʻda iltimās ṭāʼifah min aʻyān al-afāḍil wa-afāḍil al-aʻyān alladhīna hum bi-manzilat al-insān lil-ʻayn wa-al-ʻayn lil-insān, maʻa mā bī min al-ʻawāʼiq. Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kanz al-daqāʼiq, wa-huwa wa-in khalá min al-ghuwayṣāt wa-al-muʻḍilāt, fa-qad taḥallá bi-masāʼil al-fatāwá wa-al-wāqiʻāt, muʻlaman bi-tilka al-ʻalāmāt. Wa-ziyādat al-Ṭāʼ lil-iṭlāqāt. Wa-Allāh al-muwaffiq lil-itmām wa-al-muyassir lil-ikhtitām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-masʹḥ raqabatihi wa-yanquḍuhu khurūj najas.
15.3 x 21 cm; written surface: 8 x 11.3 cm; 9 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark blue cloth on spine and flap.
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf (in pencil): "Fiqh lil-Nasafī. Matn al-Kanz li-Abī al-Barākāt [al-Barakāt] ʻAbd Allāh ibn Aḥmad ibn Maḥmūd al-Nasafī."

At the head of folio 192a: An ownership statement: "Dakhala fī mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá al-Sayyid ʻAlī ibn al-Shaykh Ayyūb, sanat 1157 [of the Hijrah = 1744/1745]", and a partially legible seal of the owner.
On folios 192b-193b: Miscellaneous quotations in different hands.
Colophon (folio 192a): "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Tammat al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, yawm al-Arbaʻ, min shahr Shaʻbān, sanat [...]."

Translation of the colophon: "God is more knowledgeable of what is correct. To Him is the reference and returning. The book is completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence, on 4 Shaʻbān, the year [...]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Muntazaʻ al-mukhtār min al-Ghayth al-midrār al-mufattiḥ li-kamāʼim al-Azʹhār : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī al-Qāsim ibn Miftāḥ.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Muqaddimah lā yasaʻu al-muqallid jahluhā. al-Maʻná innahu lā yajūzu la-hu al-ikhlāl bi-maʻrifatihā. Faṣl dhakara fīhi Mawlānā [... ...] man yajūzu la-hu al-taqlīd wa-man yaḥrumu ʻalayhi, wa-mā yajūzu al-taqlīd fīhi min al-aḥkām wa-mā lā yajūz, fa-qāl: al-Taqlīd, wa-huwa qabūl qawl al-ghayr min ghayr an tuṭālibahu bi-ḥujjah fī al-masāʼil al-farʻīyah, iḥtirāz min al-uṣūlīyah, sawāʼ akānat fī uṣūl al-dīn, aw uṣūl al-fiqh, aw uṣūl al-qasam ...".
Secundo folio: turattabu ʻalá al-kufr aw al-fisq.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 16.5 cm; 35 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather with flap; central medallion on cover and flap.
In medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'al-Ghayth al-midrār al-mufattiḥ li-kamāʼim al-Azʹhār' in red; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Muntazaʻ al-mukhtār min al-Ghayth al-midrār al-mufattiḥ li-kamāʼim al-Azʹhār, intazaʻahu man lam yunāziʻhu fī al-waraʻ al-saḥīḥ munāziʻ, wa-jamaʻahu man aḍḥá li-shatīt al-faḍāʼil jāmiʻ, mūḍiḥ al-masāʼil bi-adillah aḍwá min al-ṣabāḥ, wa-muḥaqqiq al-ḥaqāʼiq bi-ḥujaj nīrān hayyāj, fa-huwa idhan adāla li-kull minhum miftāḥ, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī al-Qāsim ibn Miftāḥ, raḥmat Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ruḍwānuh, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá nawālih, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih."

On folio 1a: "Kāna al-shurūʻ shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, fī awāʼilihi, wa-dhālika fī sanat thamāniyah wa-sittīn wa-alf <sanah>. Ballagha Allāh al-tamām bi-mannih wa-karamih, bi-ḥaqq Muḥammad wa-ālih, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn. [Āmīn], Allāhumma, Āmīn."
On folio 1a: "Sanat 1150 [... ... ...] afqar al-ʻibād ilá raḥmat al-Ghanī al-Jawwād al-Sayyid [...]."
On folio 1a: "Yuʻtabaru hādhā al-kitāb min mukhallaf al-Qāḍī Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī [...] fī al-dayn [?], fī shahr Rajab, sant 1100, li-Ṣāliḥ ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī Bakr [...]."

On folio 1a: A borrower's statement: "Hādhā kitāb Sharḥ al-Azʹhār, ṣāra ʻindī ʻāriyah, bi-naẓar al-Qāḍī Ṣāliḥ ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī Bakr al-ḥākim fī Ḥiṣn Kawkabān al-maḥrūs billāh, fa-yuʻlam [fa-li-yuʻlam] dhālik. Wa-katabahu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥamīd al-Dīn [... ...]."
On folio 287a: An invocation.

On folios 287a-288b: Selections from "al-Masāʼil al-murtaḍāh fī mā yaʻtamiduhu al-quḍāh" (Agreeable rulings which are applied by the judges) of Amīr al-Muʼminīn al-Mutawwakil ʻalá Allāh (could not be identified).

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-mann al-ʻAzīz al-Wahhāb, fa-la-hu al-ḥamd ʻalá kull ḥāl min al-aḥwāl, wa-ṣalawātuhu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi khayr āl. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min raqm al-Sharḥ al-mubārak baʻda al-ʻaṣr, yawm al-Thulāthāʼ, laʻallahu 28 shahr Rajab al-aṣabb, ʻām 1074 [25 February, 1664], bi-khaṭṭ mālikihi, al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī bi-hi ʻamman siwāh, afqar al-ʻibād ilayhi, wa-aḥwajihim ilayhi, al-mutawakkil fī kull umūrihi ʻalayhi, ʻazza wa-jall, Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Hādī ibn Ṣalāḥ ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-ʻAbbāsī nasaban wa-al-Zaydī madhhaban, al-ʻAdlī iʻtiqādan, wa-al-Kawkabānī maskanan, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-tajāwaza ʻan sayyiʼātihi wa-waffaqahu ilá riḍāh wa-jaʻala khayr aʻmālihi khawātimahā wa-khayr ayyāmihi yawma luqāh, wa-ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi [wa-] al-muʼminīn, bi-ḥaqq Muḥammad al-amīn wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the grace of the Almighty Benevolent One, praise be to Him in all situations. May His prayers be upon our Master Muḥammad and upon his family, who are the best of all families. This blessed Commentary was completed on the afternoon of Tuesday, dated the 28th of the month of Rajab, 1074 [of the Hijrah = 25 February, 1664], in the handwriting of its owner, a servant, poor to God, but rich through Him, not through any other beside Him, the poorest to Him of His servants, the neediest to Him, and the dependent on Him in all his matters, may He be praised and glorified, Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Hādī ibn Ṣalāḥ ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-ʻAbbāsī nasaban wa-al-Zaydī madhhaban, al-ʻAdlī iʻtiqādan, wa-al-Kawkabānī maskanan, may God forgive his sins, excuse his shortcomings, lead him into His contentment, make his best deeds the last ones, and his best days the day he meets Him. May God forgive him, his parents [and] the believers, by the intercession of Muḥammad, the Trustworthy one, and his virtuous family."

record.title: 880-03 al-Ishārāt fī ʻilm al-ʻibārāt : manuscript / Khalīl ibn Shāhīn al-Ẓāhirī.
record.note: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khalaqa Ādam min ṭīn, thumma nafakha fīhi rūḥan wa-iṣṭafāhu lil-risālah, kamā iṣṭafá Idrīs min baʻdihi Nūḥan, wa-ittakhadha Ibrāhīm khalīlan, wa-Mūsá kalīman, wa-Ismāʻīl dhabīḥan, wa-naṣara Hūdan ʻalá ʻĀd, wa-alāna al-ḥadīd li-Dāwūd, wa-wassaʻa li-Sulaymān rawḥan wa-sakhkhara la-hu rīḥan ..."
Secundo folio: muqirrun bi-hā al-qalb wa-al-lisān.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 18 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 unnumbered quires).
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Ishārāt wa-al-manāmāt fī ʻilm al-ʻibārāt, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-baḥr al-humām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah wa-al-ḥabr al-nassābah, ḥujjat al-muʻtabarīn wa-lisān al-mutakallimīn, al-Shaykh Khalīl ibn Shāhīn al-Ẓāhirī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-ruḍwānih wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih. Āmīn. Yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 2b: "... wa-sammaytuhu Kitāb al-Ishārāt fī ʻilm al-ʻibārāt ..."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with "al-Bāb al-Thāmin" (Chapter Eight), titled: "Fī ruʼyat al-wuḍūʼ wa-al-ghasl wa-al-tayammum wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-qirāʼah wa-al-maṣāḥif wa-al-mujalladāt wa-al-hayākil", as follows: "... Sūrat al-Zumar. Qāla Ibn Sīrīn: Man qaraʼahā ghafara Allāh la-hu dhunūbahu wa-tajāwaza ʻanhu. Wa-qāla al-Kirmānī: Takūnu ʻāqibatuhu khayran. Wa-qīla iktisāb kutub kathīrah wa-fahm wa-baṣīrah. Wa-rubbamā yataṣaʻʻabu li-aḥad an yakūna ..."

record.title: 880-01 Ḥujjah sharʻīyah : manuscript.
record.note: Title from the document.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Ujriyat bi-mā fīhi. Bi-al-Bāb al-ʻĀlī, aʻlāhu Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, wa-sharrafahu, bi-Miṣr al-maḥrūsah, baʻda al-idhn al-karīm min Ḥaḍrat Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, fakhr al-mawālī al-ʻiẓām, qāḍī quḍāt al-Islām yawmaidhin bi-Miṣr al-maḥmīyah, al-muwaqqaʻ khaṭṭuhu wa-khatmuhu al-karīmayn aʻlāh, dāma ʻulāh. Āmīn, lil-faqīr ʻAlī al-Khaṭīb, aḥad kuttāb hādhihi al-Maḥkamah, bi-samāʻ wa-kitābat mā yaʼtī dhikruhu fīhi fa-ladayhi bi-al-majlis al-munʻaqid bi-Dīwān Qūmisiyūn al-Arāḍī al-Mīrīyah, al-kāʼin bi-Shāriʻ Jāmiʻ al-Kanjīyah, bi-Qism ʻĀbidīn, bi-Miṣr: Asqaṭa Wakīl Ḥaḍrat Mawlānā al-Khudaywi al-muʻaẓẓam, Muḥammad Tawfīq Bāshā, Khudaywi Miṣr ḥālan, dāmat saʻādatuhu wa-tawālat masarratuhu. Āmīn, huwa Janāb Idwār Būtarūn, aʻḍāʼ Faransāwī bi-al-Qūmisiyūn al-madhkūr ḥālan, al-wakālah al-sharʻīyah fī shaʼn mā sa-yudhkaru fīhi wa-ghayrihi, al-maqbūlah bi-al-ṭarīq al-sharʻī, ḥaqq jihat al-mīrī al-mashmūlah bi-wilāyat Ḥaḍrat Mawlānā al-Khudaywi al-muʻaẓẓam al-mushār ilayhi, al-wilāyah al-ʻāmmah lil-ḥurmah Ḥasanah al-maʻrūfah bi-wālidat al-marḥūm Ḥabshī Muḥammad min ʻasākir al-Bāsh Buzk Kān, al-sākinah bi-Nāḥiyat Abū Rajwān al-Qiblī, bi-Mudīrīyat al-Jīzah, bint Sayyid ʻAbduh ibn Sulaymān, min arbāb al-maʻāshāt ..."
27 x 77 cm; written surface: 20 x 65 cm.
In naskh/ruqʻah script in black ink, on white paper.
At the top of the document: Two embossed illegible seals and one illegible seal in blue.
At the head of the document, under the seals: "Ḥujjah sharʻīyah min fawq thamāniyat ʻashar alf ghirsh ilá tisʻat ʻashar alf ghirsh, thamanuhā thamāniyah wa-thamānūn ghirsh. 38."

Colophon. The document ends with: "... thumma ʻuriḍa dhālik ʻalá Ḥaḍrat Mawlānā Afandī, al-mushār ilayhi, fa-lammā an aḥāṭa ʻilmuhu al-karīm bi-dhālik, amara bi-kitābatihi wa-qaydihi bi-al-sijill al-maḥfūẓ ḍabṭan lil-wāqiʻ. Wa-taḥarrara dhālik bi-dūn rasm, bināʼan ʻalá al-khiṭābayn al-wāridayn li-hādhihi al-Maḥkamah min Naẓārat al-Ḥaqqānīyah, al-muʼarrakh aḥaduhumā fī rābiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ Ākhir, sanat arbaʻ wa-thalāthmiʼah wa-alf [10 January 1887], al-muqayyid bi-nimrah arbaʻah ʻumūm, wa-al-thānī muʼarrakh fī tāsiʻ shahr Shaʻbān, sanat tārīkhihi [3 May, 1887], muqayyid bi-nimrah ithnayn wa-miʼah taḥrīran, fī tārīkhayn, awwaluhumā yawm ṣudūr al-isqāṭ al-madhkūr wa-al-ishhād bi-hi wa-al-tawāfuq ʻalá al-shurūṭ al-marqūmah, wa-huwa sādis shahr al-Qaʻdah, wa-thānīhumā yawm ṣudūr al-iqrār bi-al-qismah al-madhkūrah wa-al-ishhād bi-hi, wa-huwa ʻāshir shahr al-Qaʻdah al-madhkūr, sanat arbaʻ [corrected to sitt] wa-thalāthmiʼah wa-alf. ʻAlī al-Khaṭīb. Quyyidat bi-Sijill al-Mubāyaʻāt, nimrah 34, juzʼ 18, ʻadad 29. [two signatures]."

record.title: 880-02 al-ʻIqd al-manẓūm fī dhikr afāḍil al-Rūm : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Bālī Manq.
record.note: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yā man qaddara al-ājāl wa-jaʻala lahā madadan, wa-dabbara al-umūr wa-aḥṣá kulla shayʼin ʻadadan, Ṣalli ʻalá Muḥammad, khayr man naṭaqa bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ūtiya al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb, wa-khutima bi-hi al-Risālah wa-al-Kitāb, wa-man tabiʻahu bi-iḥsān min al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb. Wa-baʻd, fa-naḥnu naquṣṣu ʻalayka aḥsan al-qaṣaṣ wa-al-akhbār min tawārīkh al-ʻulamāʼ al-kibār wa-al-mashāyikh al-akhyār alladhīna darajū fī zamānī, wa-shālat naʻāmatuhum fī ʻaṣrī wa-awānī, min alladhīna tabarraktu bi-ṣuḥbatihim, aw tasharraftu bi-mujarrad ruʼyatihim ..."
Secundo folio: min hādhā al-zamān qad salla sayfa baghyih.

Incipit of the mystical/alchemical text: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-Shams ḍiyāʼan wa-al-Qamar nūran, wa-zāda bihimā lil-ʻālam bahjatan wa-surūran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-kāmilīn al-mukammalīn fī al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-lā sīyamā Muḥammad al-ẓāhir al-ḥujjah wa-al-bāhir bayānuh, wa-al-aṣḥāb wa-al-āl alladhīna ṣaʻadū ilá dhurwat al-kamāl. Wa-baʻd, ayyuhā al-ṭālib li-ḥaqīqat al-ḥāl wa-ḥaqqīyat al-maqāl, qad ḍāʻa māluka wa-ʻumruka li-fakk rumūz al-qawm ..."
15.3 x 23 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.
On the preliminary leaf: An ownership statement and a seal: "Thumma ṣāra min kutub al-ʻabd al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Muḥammad al-Mudarris, ghufira lahumā."
On the upper left corner of the preliminary leaf: "Tadhyīl al-Shaqāʼiq al-Nuʻmānīyah, li-Mawlānā al-fāḍil, ʻAlī Afandī, al-maʻrūf bi-al-asmāʼ ilá al-ʻAllāmah al-niḥrīr al-shahīr Nājī [Bālī?] Zādah."
On folio 1a (in pencil): "al-ʻIqd al-manẓūm fī dhikr afāḍil al-Rūm, li-ʻAlī ibn Bālī al-maʻrūf bi-Munuq."

On folio 1a: The following ownership statements and three illegible seals, as follows: "Istaṣḥabahu al-faqīr ilayhi subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, Sulaymān Sarmad, al-mudarris bi-Dār al-Salṭanah al-ʻAlīyah." "Thumma intaqala ilá nawbat ʻabd [al-ʻabd] al-mudhnib al-muḥtāj ilá luṭf Rabbih al-Khāliq Nafas [Nafīs (?)] Zādah al-Sayyid Muḥammad Ṣādiq, yassara Allāh la-hu mā aradahu [arādahu] min qibal al-Rāziq." "Thumma dakhala fī silk malikihi [mālikihi] al-faqīr al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-Qadīr ʻUmar [... ... ...]."
At the head of folio 1b: "Hādhā Kitāb Tadhyīl al-Shaqāʼiq al-Nuʻmānīyah."
Colophon of al-ʻIqd al-manẓūm fī dhikr afāḍil al-Rūm: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb."
Translation of the colophon of al-ʻIqd al-manẓūm fī dhikr afāḍil al-Rūm: "The book was completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King."

The mystical/alchemical text ends with: "... fa-man fakka rumūz hādhā al-mawḍiʻ, wa-waqafa ʻalá al-ḥajar al-aḥmar wa-bayāḍ al-bayḍ al-mudawwar, fa-qad ṣāra min al-ḥukamāʼ al-wāṣilīn, wa-inkharaṭa fī silk al-rāsikhīn, fa-ʻalayhi al-sirr wa-al-kitmān wa-taqwá Allāh al-Malik al-Mustaʻān. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-itmām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-kirām."
Colophon of the mystical/alchemical text: "Tamma al-jamʻ wa-al-taʼlīf fī thalāth baqayna min al-Rabīʻ al-Awwal, li-sanat khams wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf."
Translation of the colophon of the mystical/alchemical text: "The compilation and writing was completed three nights left from al-Rabīʻ al-Awwal of the year 1125 [of the Hijrah = 23 April 1713]."

record.title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥifnī.
record.note: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām wa-al-ḥabr al-humām, murabbī al-sālikīn wa-mufīd al-ṭālibīn, al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil wa-al-wāṣil al-kāmil, alladhī huwa li-ʻawārif al-maʻārif ḥāwī, Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Ḥifnāwī, aṭlaʻa Allāh fī samāʼ al-maʻālī Shams isʻādih, wa-ghamaranī wa-al-Muslimīn bi-wābil amdādih. Āmīn: Ḥamdan li-man naṣaba li-taḥrīr fiqh al-mawārīth aʻlāman, wa-jaʻala lahum min thamarāt imtithāl 'Taʻallamū al-farāʼiḍ wa-ʻallimūhu' aʻlāman ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāhu al-ghanī, asīr al-masāwī, Muḥammad al-Ḥifnī: Qad ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ aʻizzāʼ aḥbāb, faḍlan bulaghāʼ adhkiyāʼ anjāb an uʻalliqa ʻalá al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah mā yataʻallaqu bi-īḍāḥ tarākībih bi-ṭuruq ījāzīyah, māʼilan ʻan al-ikthār mimmā mallat minhu al-asmāʻ bādhil al-juhd fī ittibāʻ al-muḥtāj ilayhi atamma ittibāʻ, fa-ajabtuhu li-mā ṭalaba, rājiyan bi-barakatihi bulūgh al-arab. Qawluhu 'al-ʻĀlamīn' ..."
Secundo folio: bi-īḍāḥ tarākībihi bi-ṭuruq ījāzīyah.
11.5 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover, with dark brown leather on spine (in four numbered quires).

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of 'al-Fawāʼid al-Shinshawrīyah' preceded by the phrase 'Qawluh' (His saying) in red; markings in red; some commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Ḥifnī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Raḥbīyah lil-Imām al-Shinshawrī, nafaʻanā Allāh bihim."

On folio 1a: An endowment and copying statement: "Waqf lillāh taʻālá. Awqafa wa-ḥabasa wa-taṣaddaqa bi-hādhihi al-nuskhah kātibuhā Aḥmad ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Wāṭī al-Mālikī ʻalá ṭalabat al-ʻilm bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azʹhar, wa-jaʻala maqarrahā bi-al-khizānah al-kāʼinah bi-Ruwāq al-Riyāfah, wa-laʻana Allāh man ḍayyaʻahā, aw bāʻahā, aw saraqahā; fa-man baddalahu baʻdamā samiʻahu fa-innamā ithmuhu ʻalá alladhīna yubaddilūnahu. Taḥrīran fī shahr Ramaḍān, sanat 1184 [December 1770/January 1771]. Ḥaḍartu dhālika wa-shahidtu bi-hi: al-Faqīr muḥammad Sarḥān al-Wāṭī al-Mālikī." An illegible seal.

Author's colophon: "Hādhā ākhir mā yassarahu al-Fattāḥ ʻalá Sharḥ al-Raḥbīyah lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shinshawrī, jaʻalahu Allāh yawma al-fazaʻ al-akbar min asbāb surūrī. Wa-al-rajāʼ mimman naẓara fīhi iqālat al-ʻatharāt, wa-al-duʻāʼ bi-ghafr al-sayyiʼāt. Wa-afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Akmal Sāʼir al-Anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi al-sādah al-kirām wa-ṣaḥbihi nujūm al-Islām. Wāfaqa al-farāgh min taʼlīfihi sādis ʻashar Rajab, min shuhūr sanat khams wa-khamsīn wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-salām."

Translation of the author's colophon: "This is the end of what was facilitated by al-Fattāḥ ["the Facilitator", an attribute of God] of 'Sharḥ al-Raḥbīyah' of the learned scholar al-Shinshawrī. May God render it, on the day of the great fear [Judgement Day], a means for my happiness. I request those who read it to correct whatever mistakes they find in it, and to invoke God to forgive my shortcomings. May the best prayer and peace be upon the Most Perfect of Mankind [Prophet Muḥammad], and upon his honorable family and his companions the stars of Islam. It was written on 16 Rajab, 1155 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [16 September, 1742], may the best peace be upon Him."
Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kutibat hādhihi al-nuskhah min nuskhah kutibat naqlan min khaṭṭ al-muʼallif, maʻa al-muqābalah ḥasba al-ṭāqah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-itmām."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This copy was copied from a copy transcribed from a copy in the handwriting of the author, having been collated to the best of ability. Praise be to God for the completion."

record.title: 880-02 al-Fatāwá al-kubrá. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
record.note: Title supplied by Hartford Seminary.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala Aḥmad aʻlam hādhihi al-ummah, wa-shihābahā alladhī yuzīlu ʻanhā min dujá al-ishkāl kull ẓulmah, wa-nayyirahā al-waqqād alladhī yujlī bi-futyāhu al-masāʼil al-mudlahimmah, wa-bayyana al-ṣawāb minhā, fa-lam yakun amruhā ʻalaynā ghummah. Naḥmaduhu ḥamda man nāla min al-ʻulūm awfar naṣīb, wa-nashkuruhu shukra man ijtahada fīhā fa-kāna fī ijtihādihi dhā sahmin muṣīb. Wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka la-hu shahādatan naʻtadduhā lil-jawāb fī yawm al-suʼāl, wa-nattakhidhuhā dhakhīratan fī al-māḍī wa-al-mustaqbal wa-al-ḥāl. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh alladhī laysa li-millatihi ʻalá ṭūl al-madā [al-madá] durūs, wa-lā li-ʻulamāʼ ummatihi mazīyah illā bi-maḥāsin al-wujūh al-bādiyah fī muṣannafātihim wa-al-durūs ..."
Secundo folio: al-jazīl kamā akhbara bi-hi al-Ṣādiq al-Ṣadūq.
18.5 x 28 cm; written surface: 13 x 20.5 cm; 35 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown cover with central medallion.

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, with the phrases of "Suʼila" (He was asked) and "fa-Ajāba" (and He answered) in red; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min Fatāwá Ibn Ḥajar al-Makkī." "al-Niṣf al-awwal min Fatāwá Ibn Ḥajar [al-Makkī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá]. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Tamma hādhā al-juzʼ al-awwal al-mubārak kitābatan min Fatāwá Mawlānā Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih, bi-jāh Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥābatih wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, wa-sallam. Āmīn. Tamm. Wa-dhālika min kitābat al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad, al-rājī raḥmat Rabbihi al-qadīr, yasʼalu al-duʻāʼ mimman naẓara fīhi, aw qaraʼ fīhi, la-hu wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-ʻafw ʻanhu, wa-ʻan man kāna al-sabab fī dhālik, wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Tamma dhālika bi-tārīkh thālith ʻashar shahr Shaʻbān al-mukarram, min shuhūr sanat sabʻ wa-thamānīn wa-tisʻimaiʼah."

Translation of the colophon: "Completed is this blessed first part of the Fatwas of our Master, the learned and erudite scholar of Islam and Muslims, al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, may God shield him with His mercy, and benefit us and the Muslims with his blessing, by the intercession of Muḥamamd, his companions, his family and his followers, may God grant them peace. Amen. It is completed by the handwriting of the poor servant Muḥammad, who seeks the mercy of his Mighty Lord, and requests invocation, for him and all Muslims, from whoever looks into the book, or reads it, to be forgiven and pardoned, with whoever participated in bringing it into existence, and all Muslims. Amen. Completed on 13 Shaʻbān, 987 of the Hijrah [15 October, 1579]."

record.title: 880-02 Mukhtārāt al-nawāzil : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr al-Marghīnānī.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 4b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. "al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi al-Muṣṭafá Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭayyibīn al-ṭāhirīn ajmaʻīn. Kitāb al-Ṭahārāt. al-Ṭahārah fī al-lughah ʻibārah ʻan al-naẓāfah, wa-fī al-Sharīʻah, ʻibārah ʻan ghasl aʻḍāʼ makhṣūṣah bi-ṣifah makhṣūṣah, wa-hiya anwāʻ: Ṭahārat al-ṣughrá wa-Ṭahārat al-kubrá, wa-hiya ṭahārah ʻan al-ḥadath, wa-ṭahārat al-thawb wa-al-badan, wa-hiya ṭahārah ʻan al-khabath. Bāb mā yajūzu bi-hi al-wuḍūʼ, wa-mā lā yajūz. Faṣl fī al-miyāh ..."
Secundo folio: Yūsuf, annahu lam yujawwiz fī al-badan.
14.3 x 18.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 12 cm; 14lines per page.
Binding: Cover missing; dark brown leather on spine.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red and large black script; some notes on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a-3b: Miscellaneous quotations on Islamic law.
At the head of folio 4a: "Hādhā kitāb Mukhtārāt nawāzil, li-ṣāḥib al-Hidāyah."
At the head of folio 5a: An endowment statement: "Waqf Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-Chakmajlī."

Text ends abruptly on folio 276b, as follows: "... rawá al-Ḍaḥḥāk ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, rḍ, annahu qāl: Yakūnu baʻd al-Nabī nūr yukanná Abū Ḥ, yaḥya dīn Allāh wa-Sunnat Rasūl Allāh ʻalá yadih. Wa-ʻan Anas, qāl, qāla Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Yakūnu fī ākhir al-zamān rajul yukanná bi-Abī Ḥanīfah, yaḥyá dīn Allāh taʻālá wa-Sunnatī ʻalá yadih. Thumma shurrifa bi-al-dhikr fī Ḥadīth ākhar: Muliʼa qalbuhu ʻilman wa-ḥikmah ..."
Folio 277 is bound upside-down and contains miscellaneous quotations.
At the head of folio 277a: "ʻAdad masāʼil hādhā al-kitāb alf wa-khamsmiʼat wa-ithnān wa-thalāthūn, wa-dhakar al-khilāf fī miʼah wa-sabʻīn, wa-lam yadhkur al-qiyās illā fī [...?]."

Colophon (at the lower right margin of folio 276b): "Tammat al-kitāb, bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb, ʻalá yad ʻAbd [al-ʻabd] al-ḍaʻīf, al-muḥtāj, al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-Ghanī, Muḥammad ibn Mawlānā ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mawlānā Qāsim, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi. Tārīkhuhu sanat thalāthīn wa-tisʻimiʼah."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King, by the hand of the feeble, needy and poor to Gracious God, Muḥammad ibn Mawlānā ʻAbd Allāh ibn Mawlānā Qāsim, may God forgive him and his parents and treat them and him favorably. Dated in the year 930 [of the Hijrah = 1523/1524]."

record.title: 880-02 al-Wasīlah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻadada naʻmāʼihi, wa-al-shukru la-hu ʻalá tawālī ālāʼihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad khayr anbiyāʼihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi khayr awliyāʼihi, fa-inna kitābī al-mawḍūʻ fī ṣināʻat al-hawāʼī, al-musammá bi-al-Maʻūnah, lammā kathura ʻilmuhu, wa-kabura ʻalá himam ʻāmmat ahl al-ʻaṣr ḥajmuhu, raʼaytu an aqtaṣirahu fī awrāq qalīlah ʻalá maqāṣidihi al-jalīlah, li-yakūna la-hu dhālika ka-al-wasīlah, wa-yuqarriba ijtināʼ thamaratihi bi-alṭaf ḥīlah, fa-sharaʻtu fīmā qaṣadtu muʻtamidan ʻalá Allāh al-Karīm fī tasʹhīl mā aradtu, wa-rattabtuhu ayḍan ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāthat aqsām wa-khātimah ..."
Secundo folio: ussuhā, aw, fī ayy manzilah hiya.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 18.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 4 unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb matn Wasīlat Ibn al-Hāʼim, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-barakatihi. Āmīn. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn. M M M."

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-fī hādhā al-qadr alladhī awradtuhu kifāyah li-man ʻarafahu. Wa-man arāda al-tabaḥḥur fī hādhā al-fann, wa-al-wuqūf ʻalá mā yashfī al-ghalīl, fa-ʻalayhi bi-al-Maʻūnah. Wa-faragha min taswīdihā muʼallifuhā fī al-thāmin wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 793. Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Tammat ʻalá yad Khalīl ibn Aḥmad al-Shabrāwī al-Madābighī, sanat 1198. M M M."

Translation of the colophon: "God is more knowledgeable. What I introduced here is enough for him who masters it. However, if someone wants to delve into this art and aquire what satiates his thirst, he should study 'al-Maʻūnah'. The author finished writing the draft on 28 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, 793 of the Hijrah [12 April, 1391]. God is more knowledgeable. Copied by Khalīl ibn Aḥmad al-Shabrāwī al-Madābighī, in the year 1198 [of the Hijrah = 1783/1784]. M M M."

record.title: 880-03 al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Ibn Khaldūn.
record.note: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-ghanī bi-luṭfihi, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn al-Ḥaḍramī, waffaqahu Allāh taʻālá: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī la-hu al-ʻizzah wa-al-jabarūt, wa-bi-yadihi al-mulk wa-al-malakūt, wa-la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná wa-al-nuʻūt, al-ʻālim fa-lā [yaghrubu ʻanhu mā] yuẓhiruhu [tuẓhiruhu] al-najwá, aw yukhfīhi al-sukūt, al-qādir, fa-lā yuʻjizuhu shayʼ fī al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ wa-lā yafūt, anshaʼanā min al-arḍ nasaman, wa-istaʻmaranā fīhā ajyālan wa-umaman, wa-yassara lanā minhā arzāqan wa-qisaman, yukannifunā al-arḥām wa-al-buyūt, wa-yakfulunā al-rizq wa-al-qūt, wa-tablīnnā al-ayyām wa-al-wuqūt, wa-taʻtawirunā al-ājāl allatī khaṭṭa ʻalaynā kitābahā al-mawqūt, wa-la-hu al-baqāʼ wa-al-thubūt, wa-Huwa al-ḥayy alladhī lā yamūt ..."
Secundo folio: min al-qurūn al-uwal.
22.5 x 34.5 cm; written surface: 14 x 24 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with dark red leather on spine.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text within double red frame; catchwords.
On folio 2b: "... wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāthat kutub. al-Muqaddimah: Fī faḍl ʻilm al-tārīkh, wa-taḥqīq madhāhibihi, wa-al-ilmāʻ bi-maghāliṭ al-muʼarrikhīn ..."
On folio 3a: "... sammaytuhu 'Kitāb al-ʻibar wa-dīwān al-mubtadaʼ wa-al-khabar fī ayyām al-ʻArab wa-al-ʻAjam wa-al-Barbar wa-man ʻāṣarahum min dhawī al-sulṭān al-akbar' ..."

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā katabahu al-Faqīh Ibn Khaldūn. Intahá bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn ʻawnih wa-tawfīqhi kitāb Muqaddiamt al-Shaykh al-Faqīh, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-waḥīd dahrih, Ibn Khaldūn, raḥimahu Allāh wa-taghammadahu bi-raḥmatih, wa-aʻāda ʻalá al-Muslimīn min barakātih. Āmīn. Bi-jāh Sayyid al-Awwalīn wa-al-Ākharīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-qadīr, al-muʻtarf bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, ʻAlī Muḥammad al-Mālikī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskh hādhā al-juzʼ al-mubārak yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, sabʻata ʻashar yawman khalat [rubbamā baqiyat] min shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, sanat 1270 min Hijratihi, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm."

Translation of the colophon: "This is the end of what was written by the Scholar Ibn Khaldūn. Completed, by the praise of God and His help and abundant benevolence, is the book of 'al-Muqaddimah' of the learned scholar, the unique in his time and age, Ibn Khaldūn, may God have mercy upon him, shield him with His compassion and bestow upon the Muslims of his blessings. Amen. By the intercession of the Master of the Former and the Latter, our Master Muḥammad, may the best prayer and peace be upon him. Copied by the hand of the poor to the mercy of his Mighty Lord, he who admits his disability and inefficiency, ʻAlī Muḥammad al-Mālikī, may God forgive him, his parents and the Muslims. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, on his family and companions and grant them peace. The copy of this blessed part was completed on blessed Thursday, seventeen days having passed [probably remaining] of the month of Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, 1270 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [12 January, 1854], may the best prayer and peace be upon him."
